123static std::array<QString, 12> s_noteStrings {
124 "C", "C\u266F / D\u266D", "D", "D\u266F / E\u266D", "E", "F", "F\u266F / G\u266D",
125 "G", "G\u266F / A\u266D", "A", "A\u266F / B\u266D", "B"
126};
127
128static QString getNoteString(int key)
129{
130 return s_noteStrings[key % 12] + QString::number(static_cast<int>(FirstOctave + key / KeysPerOctave));
131}

246 connect( unmarkAllAction, &QAction::triggered, [this](){ markSemiTone(SemiToneMarkerAction::UnmarkAll); });
247 connect( copyAllNotesAction, &QAction::triggered, [this](){ markSemiTone(SemiToneMarkerAction::CopyAllNotesOnKey); });

249 [this](QString const& cls, QString const& attribute, QString const& value)
250 {

252 {
253 return;
254 }
255 this->m_doAutoQuantization = (value.toInt() != 0);

257
258 markScaleAction->setEnabled( false );
259 markChordAction->setEnabled( false );
260
261 connect( this, SIGNAL(semiToneMarkerMenuScaleSetEnabled(bool)), markScaleAction, SLOT(setEnabled(bool)));
262 connect( this, SIGNAL(semiToneMarkerMenuChordSetEnabled(bool)), markChordAction, SLOT(setEnabled(bool)));
263
264 m_semiToneMarkerMenu->addAction( markSemitoneAction );
265 m_semiToneMarkerMenu->addAction( markAllOctaveSemitonesAction );
266 m_semiToneMarkerMenu->addAction( markScaleAction );

292 this, SLOT( updatePositionStepRecording( const lmms::TimePos& ) ) );

294 // update timeline when in record-accompany mode

296 // TODO
297/* connect( engine::getSong()->getPlayPos( Song::PlayMode::Pattern ).m_timeLine,
298 SIGNAL( positionChanged( const lmms::TimePos& ) ),
299 this,
300 SLOT( updatePositionAccompany( const lmms::TimePos& ) ) );*/
301
302 removeSelection();
303
304 // init scrollbars
305 m_leftRightScroll = new QScrollBar( Qt::Horizontal, this );
306 m_leftRightScroll->setSingleStep( 1 );

308 SLOT(horScrolled(int)));
309
310 m_topBottomScroll = new QScrollBar( Qt::Vertical, this );
311 m_topBottomScroll->setSingleStep( 1 );
312 m_topBottomScroll->setPageStep( 20 );
313 connect( m_topBottomScroll, SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)), this,

315
316 // setup zooming-stuff
317 for( float const & zoomLevel : m_zoomLevels )
318 {

322 connect( &m_zoomingModel, SIGNAL(dataChanged()),
323 this, SLOT(zoomingChanged()));
324
325 // zoom y
326 for (float const & zoomLevel : m_zoomYLevels)
327 {
328 m_zoomingYModel.addItem(QString("%1%").arg(zoomLevel * 100));
329 }
330 m_zoomingYModel.setValue(m_zoomingYModel.findText("100%"));
331 connect(&m_zoomingYModel, SIGNAL(dataChanged()),
332 this, SLOT(zoomingYChanged()));
333
334 // Set up quantization model
335 m_quantizeModel.addItem( tr( "Note lock" ) );
336 for (auto q : Quantizations) {
337 m_quantizeModel.addItem(QString("1/%1").arg(q));
338 }
339 m_quantizeModel.setValue( m_quantizeModel.findText( "1/16" ) );
340
341 connect( &m_quantizeModel, SIGNAL(dataChanged()),
342 this, SLOT(quantizeChanged()));
343
344 // Set up note length model
345 m_noteLenModel.addItem( tr( "Last note" ),
346 std::make_unique<PixmapLoader>( "edit_draw" ) );
347 const auto pixmaps = std::array<std::string, 11>{"whole", "half", "quarter", "eighth",
348 "sixteenth", "thirtysecond", "triplethalf",
349 "tripletquarter", "tripleteighth",
350 "tripletsixteenth", "tripletthirtysecond"};
351
352 for( int i = 0; i < NUM_EVEN_LENGTHS; ++i )
353 {
354 auto loader = std::make_unique<PixmapLoader>( "note_" + pixmaps[i] );
355 m_noteLenModel.addItem( "1/" + QString::number( 1 << i ), std::move(loader) );
356 }
357 for( int i = 0; i < NUM_TRIPLET_LENGTHS; ++i )
358 {
359 auto loader = std::make_unique<PixmapLoader>( "note_" + pixmaps[i+NUM_EVEN_LENGTHS] );
360 m_noteLenModel.addItem( "1/" + QString::number( (1 << i) * 3 ), std::move(loader) );
361 }
362 m_noteLenModel.setValue( 0 );
363
364 // Note length change can cause a redraw if Q is set to lock
365 connect( &m_noteLenModel, SIGNAL(dataChanged()),
366 this, SLOT(noteLengthChanged()));
367
368 // Set up key selection dropdown
369 m_keyModel.addItem(tr("No key"));
370 // Use piano roll note strings for key dropdown
371 for (const auto& noteString : s_noteStrings)
372 {
373 m_keyModel.addItem(noteString);
374 }
375 m_keyModel.setValue(0); // start with "No key"
376 connect(&m_keyModel, &ComboBoxModel::dataChanged, this, &PianoRoll::keyChanged);
377
378 // Set up scale model
379 const InstrumentFunctionNoteStacking::ChordTable& chord_table =
380 InstrumentFunctionNoteStacking::ChordTable::getInstance();
381
382 m_scaleModel.addItem( tr("No scale") );
383 for (const InstrumentFunctionNoteStacking::Chord& chord : chord_table.chords())
384 {
385 if( chord.isScale() )
386 {
387 m_scaleModel.addItem( chord.getName() );
388 }
389 }
390
391 m_scaleModel.setValue( 0 );
392 // connect scale change to key change so it auto-highlights with scale as well
393 connect(&m_scaleModel, &ComboBoxModel::dataChanged, this, &PianoRoll::keyChanged);
394 // change can update m_semiToneMarkerMenu
395 connect( &m_scaleModel, SIGNAL(dataChanged()),
396 this, SLOT(updateSemiToneMarkerMenu()));
397
398 // Set up chord model
399 m_chordModel.addItem( tr("No chord") );
400 for (const InstrumentFunctionNoteStacking::Chord& chord : chord_table.chords())
401 {
402 if( ! chord.isScale() )
403 {
404 m_chordModel.addItem( chord.getName() );
405 }
406 }
407
408 m_chordModel.setValue( 0 );
409
410 // change can update m_semiToneMarkerMenu
411 connect( &m_chordModel, SIGNAL(dataChanged()),
412 this, SLOT(updateSemiToneMarkerMenu()));
413
414 setFocusPolicy( Qt::StrongFocus );
415 setFocus();
416 setMouseTracking( true );
417
418 connect( &m_scaleModel, SIGNAL(dataChanged()),
419 this, SLOT(updateSemiToneMarkerMenu()));
420
421 connect( Engine::getSong(), SIGNAL(timeSignatureChanged(int,int)),
422 this, SLOT(update()));
423
424 //connection for selection from timeline
425 connect( m_timeLine, SIGNAL(regionSelectedFromPixels(int,int)),
426 this, SLOT(selectRegionFromPixels(int,int)));
427
428 // Set up snap model
429 m_snapModel.addItem(tr("Nudge"));
430 m_snapModel.addItem(tr("Snap"));
431 m_snapModel.setValue(0);
432 changeSnapMode();
433 connect(&m_snapModel, SIGNAL(dataChanged()),
434 this, SLOT(changeSnapMode()));
435
436 m_stepRecorder.initialize();
437
438 // trigger a redraw if keymap definitions change (different keys may become disabled)
439 connect(Engine::getSong(), SIGNAL(keymapListChanged(int)), this, SLOT(update()));
440}

451void PianoRoll::showTextFloat(const QString &text, const QPoint &pos, int timeout)
452{
453 s_textFloat->setText( text );
454 // show the float, offset slightly so as to not obscure anything
455 s_textFloat->moveGlobal( this, pos + QPoint(4, 16) );
456 s_textFloat->showWithTimeout(timeout);
457}

467
468void PianoRoll::showPanTextFloat(panning_t pan, const QPoint &pos, int timeout)
469{
470 QString text;
471 if( pan < 0 )
472 {
473 text = tr("Panning: %1% left").arg( qAbs( pan ) );
474 }
475 else if( pan > 0 )
476 {
477 text = tr("Panning: %1% right").arg( qAbs( pan ) );
478 }
479 else
480 {
481 text = tr("Panning: center");
482 }
483 showTextFloat( text, pos, timeout );
484}

493
494
495void PianoRoll::markSemiTone(SemiToneMarkerAction i, bool fromMenu)
496{
497 const int key = fromMenu
498 ? m_pianoKeySelected
499 : m_keyModel.value() - 1;
500 const InstrumentFunctionNoteStacking::Chord * chord = nullptr;
501
502 // if "No key" is selected, key is -1, unmark all semitones
503 // or if scale changed from toolbar to "No scale", unmark all semitones
504 if (!fromMenu && (key < 0 || m_scaleModel.value() == 0)) { i = SemiToneMarkerAction::UnmarkAll; }
505
506 switch(i)
507 {
508 case SemiToneMarkerAction::UnmarkAll:
509 m_markedSemiTones.clear();
510 break;
511 case SemiToneMarkerAction::MarkCurrentSemiTone:
512 {
513 QList<int>::iterator it = std::find( m_markedSemiTones.begin(), m_markedSemiTones.end(), key );
514 if( it != m_markedSemiTones.end() )
515 {
516 m_markedSemiTones.erase( it );
517 }
518 else
519 {
520 m_markedSemiTones.push_back( key );
521 }
522 break;
523 }
524 case SemiToneMarkerAction::MarkAllOctaveSemiTones:
525 {
526 QList<int> aok = getAllOctavesForKey(key);
527
528 if ( m_markedSemiTones.contains(key) )
529 {
530 // lets erase all of the ones that match this by octave
531 QList<int>::iterator i;
532 for (int octave : aok)
533 {
534 i = std::find(m_markedSemiTones.begin(), m_markedSemiTones.end(), octave);
535 if (i != m_markedSemiTones.end())
536 {
537 m_markedSemiTones.erase(i);
538 }
539 }
540 }
541 else
542 {
543 // we should add all of the ones that match this by octave
544 m_markedSemiTones.append(aok);
545 }
546
547 break;
548 }
549 case SemiToneMarkerAction::MarkCurrentScale:
550 chord = & InstrumentFunctionNoteStacking::ChordTable::getInstance()
551 .getScaleByName( m_scaleModel.currentText() );
552 case SemiToneMarkerAction::MarkCurrentChord:
553 {
554 if( ! chord )
555 {
556 chord = & InstrumentFunctionNoteStacking::ChordTable::getInstance()
557 .getChordByName( m_chordModel.currentText() );
558 }
559
560 if( chord->isEmpty() )
561 {
562 break;
563 }
564 else if( chord->isScale() )
565 {
566 m_markedSemiTones.clear();
567 }
568
569 const int first = chord->isScale() ? 0 : key;
570 const int last = chord->isScale() ? NumKeys : key + chord->last();
571 const int cap = (chord->isScale() || chord->last() == 0) ? trackOctaveSize() : chord->last();
572
573 for( int i = first; i <= last; i++ )
574 {
575 if( chord->hasSemiTone( ( i + cap - ( key % cap ) ) % cap ) )
576 {
577 m_markedSemiTones.push_back( i );
578 }
579 }
580 break;
581 }
582 case SemiToneMarkerAction::CopyAllNotesOnKey:
583 {
584 selectNotesOnKey();
585 break;
586 }
587 default:
588 ;
589 }
590
591 std::sort( m_markedSemiTones.begin(), m_markedSemiTones.end(), std::greater<int>() );
592 QList<int>::iterator new_end = std::unique( m_markedSemiTones.begin(), m_markedSemiTones.end() );
593 m_markedSemiTones.erase( new_end, m_markedSemiTones.end() );
594 // until we move the mouse the window won't update, force redraw
595 update();
596}
597
598
599void PianoRoll::setGhostMidiClip( MidiClip* newMidiClip )
600{
601 // Expects a pointer to a MIDI clip or nullptr.
602 m_ghostNotes.clear();
603 if( newMidiClip != nullptr )
604 {
605 for( Note *note : newMidiClip->notes() )
606 {
607 auto new_note = new Note(note->length(), note->pos(), note->key());
608 m_ghostNotes.push_back( new_note );
609 }
610 emit ghostClipSet( true );
611 }
612}
613
614
615void PianoRoll::loadGhostNotes( const QDomElement & de )
616{
617 // Load ghost notes from DOM element.
618 if( de.isElement() )
619 {
620 QDomNode node = de.firstChild();
621 while( !node.isNull() )
622 {
623 auto n = new Note;
624 n->restoreState( node.toElement() );
625 n->setVolume(DefaultVolume);
626 m_ghostNotes.push_back( n );
627 node = node.nextSibling();
628 }
629 emit ghostClipSet( true );
630 }
631}
632
633
634void PianoRoll::clearGhostClip()
635{
636 setGhostMidiClip( nullptr );
637 emit ghostClipSet( false );
638 update();
639}
640
641
642void PianoRoll::glueNotes()
643{
644 if (hasValidMidiClip())
645 {
646 NoteVector selectedNotes = getSelectedNotes();
647 if (selectedNotes.empty())
648 {
649 selectedNotes = m_midiClip->notes();
650 }
651
652 // Make undo possible
653 m_midiClip->addJournalCheckPoint();
654
655 // Sort notes on key and then pos.
656 std::sort(selectedNotes.begin(), selectedNotes.end(),
657 [](const Note * note, const Note * compareNote) -> bool
658 {
659 if (note->key() == compareNote->key())
660 {
661 return note->pos() < compareNote->pos();
662 }
663 return note->key() < compareNote->key();
664 });
665
666 QList<Note *> noteToRemove;
667
668 NoteVector::iterator note = selectedNotes.begin();
669 auto nextNote = note+1;
670 NoteVector::iterator end = selectedNotes.end();
671
672 while (note != end && nextNote != end)
673 {
674 // key and position match for glue. The notes are already
675 // sorted so we don't need to test that nextNote is the same
676 // position or next in sequence.
677 if ((*note)->key() == (*nextNote)->key()
678 && (*nextNote)->pos() <= (*note)->pos()
679 + qMax(TimePos(0), (*note)->length()))
680 {
681 (*note)->setLength(qMax((*note)->length(),
682 TimePos((*nextNote)->endPos() - (*note)->pos())));
683 noteToRemove.push_back(*nextNote);
684 ++nextNote;
685 }
686 // key or position doesn't match
687 else
688 {
689 note = nextNote;
690 nextNote = note+1;
691 }
692 }
693
694 // Remove old notes
695 for (int i = 0; i < noteToRemove.count(); ++i)
696 {
697 m_midiClip->removeNote(noteToRemove[i]);
698 }
699
700 update();
701 }
702}
703
704void PianoRoll::fitNoteLengths(bool fill)
705{
706 if (!hasValidMidiClip()) { return; }
707 m_midiClip->addJournalCheckPoint();
708 m_midiClip->rearrangeAllNotes();
709
710 // Reference notes
711 const NoteVector& refNotes = m_midiClip->notes();
712
713 // Notes to edit
714 NoteVector notes = getSelectedNotes();
715 if (notes.empty())
716 {
717 notes = refNotes;
718 }
719 else if (!fill)
720 {
721 std::sort(notes.begin(), notes.end(), Note::lessThan);
722 }
723 if (fill)
724 {
725 std::sort(notes.begin(), notes.end(), [](Note* n1, Note* n2) { return n1->endPos() < n2->endPos(); });
726 }
727
728 int length;
729 auto ref = refNotes.begin();
730 for (Note* note : notes)
731 {
732 // Fast forward to next reference note
733 while (ref != refNotes.end() && (fill ? (*ref)->pos() < note->endPos() : (*ref)->pos() <= note->pos()))
734 {
735 ref++;
736 }
737 if (ref == refNotes.end())
738 {
739 if (!fill) { break; }
740 // Last notes stretch to end of last bar
741 length = notes.back()->endPos().nextFullBar() * TimePos::ticksPerBar() - note->pos();
742 }
743 else
744 {
745 length = (*ref)->pos() - note->pos();
746 }
747 if (fill ? note->length() < length : note->length() > length)
748 {
749 note->setLength(length);
750 }
751 }
752
753 update();
754 getGUI()->songEditor()->update();
755 Engine::getSong()->setModified();
756}
757
758
759void PianoRoll::constrainNoteLengths(bool constrainMax)
760{
761 if (!hasValidMidiClip()) { return; }
762 m_midiClip->addJournalCheckPoint();
763
764 const NoteVector selectedNotes = getSelectedNotes();
765 const auto& notes = selectedNotes.empty() ? m_midiClip->notes() : selectedNotes;
766
767 TimePos bound = m_lenOfNewNotes; // will be length of last note
768 for (auto note : notes)
769 {
770 if (constrainMax ? note->length() > bound : note->length() < bound)
771 {
772 note->setLength(bound);
773 }
774 }
775
776 update();
777 getGUI()->songEditor()->update();
778 Engine::getSong()->setModified();
779}
780
781void PianoRoll::reverseNotes()
782{
783 if (!hasValidMidiClip()) { return; }
784
785 const NoteVector selectedNotes = getSelectedNotes();
786 const auto& notes = selectedNotes.empty() ? m_midiClip->notes() : selectedNotes;
787
788 m_midiClip->reverseNotes(notes);
789
790 update();
791 getGUI()->songEditor()->update();
792 Engine::getSong()->setModified();
793}
794
795
796void PianoRoll::loadMarkedSemiTones(const QDomElement & de)
797{
798 // clear marked semitones to prevent leftover marks
799 m_markedSemiTones.clear();
800 if (de.isElement())
801 {
802 QDomNode node = de.firstChild();
803 while (!node.isNull())
804 {
805 bool ok;
806 int key = node.toElement().attribute(
807 QString("key"), QString("-1")).toInt(&ok, 10);
808 if (ok && key >= 0)
809 {
810 m_markedSemiTones.append(key);
811 }
812 node = node.nextSibling();
813 }
814 }
815 // from markSemiTone, required otherwise marks will not show
816 std::sort(m_markedSemiTones.begin(), m_markedSemiTones.end(), std::greater<int>());
817 QList<int>::iterator new_end = std::unique(m_markedSemiTones.begin(), m_markedSemiTones.end());
818 m_markedSemiTones.erase(new_end, m_markedSemiTones.end());
819}
820
821
822void PianoRoll::setCurrentMidiClip( MidiClip* newMidiClip )
823{
824 if( hasValidMidiClip() )
825 {
826 m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->pianoModel()->disconnect(this);
827 m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->firstKeyModel()->disconnect(this);
828 m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->lastKeyModel()->disconnect(this);
829 m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->microtuner()->keymapModel()->disconnect(this);
830 m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->microtuner()->keyRangeImportModel()->disconnect(this);
831 m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->disconnect( this );
832 m_midiClip->disconnect(this);
833 }
834
835 // force the song-editor to stop playing if it played a MIDI clip before
836 if (Engine::getSong()->playMode() == Song::PlayMode::MidiClip)
837 {
838 Engine::getSong()->playMidiClip( nullptr );
839 }
840
841 if(m_stepRecorder.isRecording())
842 {
843 m_stepRecorder.stop();
844 }
845
846 // set new data
847 m_midiClip = newMidiClip;
848 m_currentPosition = 0;
849 m_currentNote = nullptr;
850 m_startKey = INITIAL_START_KEY;
851
852 m_stepRecorder.setCurrentMidiClip(newMidiClip);
853
854 if( ! hasValidMidiClip() )
855 {
856 //resizeEvent( NULL );
857
858 update();
859 emit currentMidiClipChanged();
860 return;
861 }
862
863 // Scroll horizontally to the start of the clip, minus a bar for aesthetics.
864 m_leftRightScroll->setValue(std::max(0, -m_midiClip->startTimeOffset() - TimePos::ticksPerBar()));
865
866 // determine the central key so that we can scroll to it
867 int central_key = 0;
868 int total_notes = 0;
869 for( const Note *note : m_midiClip->notes() )
870 {
871 if( note->length() > 0 )
872 {
873 central_key += note->key();
874 ++total_notes;
875 }
876 }
877
878 if (total_notes > 0)
879 {
880 central_key = central_key / total_notes - (NumKeys - m_totalKeysToScroll) / 2;
881 m_startKey = qBound(0, central_key, NumKeys);
882 }
883
884 // Make sure the playhead position isn't out of the clip bounds.
885 Engine::getSong()->getPlayPos(Song::PlayMode::MidiClip).setTicks(std::clamp(
886 Engine::getSong()->getPlayPos(Song::PlayMode::MidiClip).getTicks(),
887 std::max(0, -m_midiClip->startTimeOffset()),
888 m_midiClip->length() - m_midiClip->startTimeOffset()
889 ));
890
891 // resizeEvent() does the rest for us (scrolling, range-checking
892 // of start-notes and so on...)
893 resizeEvent( nullptr );
894
895 // make sure to always get informed about the MIDI clip being destroyed
896 connect( m_midiClip, SIGNAL(destroyedMidiClip(lmms::MidiClip*)), this, SLOT(hideMidiClip(lmms::MidiClip*)));
897
898 connect( m_midiClip->instrumentTrack(), SIGNAL( midiNoteOn( const lmms::Note& ) ), this, SLOT( startRecordNote( const lmms::Note& ) ) );
899 connect( m_midiClip->instrumentTrack(), SIGNAL( midiNoteOff( const lmms::Note& ) ), this, SLOT( finishRecordNote( const lmms::Note& ) ) );
900 connect( m_midiClip, SIGNAL(dataChanged()), this, SLOT(update()));
901 connect( m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->pianoModel(), SIGNAL(dataChanged()), this, SLOT(update()));
902
903 connect(m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->firstKeyModel(), SIGNAL(dataChanged()), this, SLOT(update()));
904 connect(m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->lastKeyModel(), SIGNAL(dataChanged()), this, SLOT(update()));
905 connect(m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->microtuner()->keymapModel(), SIGNAL(dataChanged()), this, SLOT(update()));
906 connect(m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->microtuner()->keyRangeImportModel(), SIGNAL(dataChanged()),
907 this, SLOT(update()));
908 connect(m_midiClip, &MidiClip::lengthChanged, this, qOverload<>(&QWidget::update));
909
910 update();
911 emit currentMidiClipChanged();
912}

918 if( m_midiClip == clip )
919 {
920 setCurrentMidiClip( nullptr );
921 }
922}

925int PianoRoll::trackOctaveSize() const
926{
927 if (!m_midiClip) { return KeysPerOctave; }
928 auto ut = m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->microtuner();
929 return ut->enabled() ? ut->octaveSize() : KeysPerOctave;

931
932
933void PianoRoll::selectRegionFromPixels( int xStart, int xEnd )
934{
935
936 xStart -= m_whiteKeyWidth;
937 xEnd -= m_whiteKeyWidth;
938
939 // select an area of notes
940 int posTicks = xStart * TimePos::ticksPerBar() / m_ppb +
941 m_currentPosition;
942 int keyNum = 0;
943 m_selectStartTick = posTicks;
944 m_selectedTick = 0;
945 m_selectStartKey = keyNum;
946 m_selectedKeys = 1;
947 // change size of selection
948
949 // get tick in which the cursor is posated
950 posTicks = xEnd * TimePos::ticksPerBar() / m_ppb +
951 m_currentPosition;
952 keyNum = 120;
953
954 m_selectedTick = posTicks - m_selectStartTick;
955 if( (int) m_selectStartTick + m_selectedTick < 0 )
956 {
957 m_selectedTick = -static_cast<int>(
958 m_selectStartTick );
959 }
960 m_selectedKeys = keyNum - m_selectStartKey;
961 if( keyNum <= m_selectStartKey )
962 {
963 --m_selectedKeys;
964 }
965
966 computeSelectedNotes( false );
967}

969
970
971
972void PianoRoll::drawNoteRect( QPainter & p, int x, int y,
973 int width, const Note * n, const QColor & noteCol, const QColor & noteTextColor,
974 const QColor & selCol, const int noteOpc, const bool borders, bool drawNoteName )
975{
976 ++x;
977 ++y;
978 width -= 2;
979
980 if( width <= 0 )
981 {
982 width = 2;
983 }
984
985 // Volume
986 auto const volumeRange = static_cast<float>(MaxVolume - MinVolume);
987 auto const volumeSpan = static_cast<float>(n->getVolume() - MinVolume);
988 float const volumeRatio = volumeSpan / volumeRange;
989 int volVal = qMin( 255, 100 + static_cast<int>( volumeRatio * 155.0f) );
990
991 // Panning
992 auto const panningRange = static_cast<float>(PanningRight - PanningLeft);
993 auto const leftPanSpan = static_cast<float>(PanningRight - n->getPanning());
994 auto const rightPanSpan = static_cast<float>(n->getPanning() - PanningLeft);
995
996 float leftPercent = qMin<float>( 1.0f, leftPanSpan / panningRange * 2.0f );
997 float rightPercent = qMin<float>( 1.0f, rightPanSpan / panningRange * 2.0f );
998
999 QColor col{noteCol};
1000 QPen pen;
1001
1002 if( n->selected() )
1003 {
1004 col = QColor( selCol );
1005 }
1006
1007 const int borderWidth = borders ? 1 : 0;
1008
1009 const int noteHeight = m_keyLineHeight - 1 - borderWidth;
1010 int noteWidth = width + 1 - borderWidth;
1011
1012 // adjust note to make it a bit faded if it has a lower volume
1013 // in stereo using gradients
1014 QColor lcol = QColor::fromHsv( col.hue(), col.saturation(),
1015 static_cast<int>(volVal * leftPercent), noteOpc );
1016 QColor rcol = QColor::fromHsv( col.hue(), col.saturation(),
1017 static_cast<int>(volVal * rightPercent), noteOpc );
1018
1019 QLinearGradient gradient( x, y, x, y + noteHeight );
1020 gradient.setColorAt( 0, rcol );
1021 gradient.setColorAt( 1, lcol );
1022 p.setBrush( gradient );
1023
1024 if ( borders )
1025 {
1026 p.setPen( col );
1027 }
1028 else
1029 {
1030 p.setPen( Qt::NoPen );
1031 }
1032
1033 p.drawRect( x, y, noteWidth, noteHeight );
1034
1035 // Draw note key text
1036 if (drawNoteName)
1037 {
1038 p.save();
1039 int const noteTextHeight = static_cast<int>(noteHeight * 0.8);
1040 if (noteTextHeight > 6)
1041 {
1042 QString noteKeyString = getNoteString(n->key());
1043
1044 QFont noteFont(p.font());
1045 noteFont = adjustedToPixelSize(noteFont, noteTextHeight);
1046 QFontMetrics fontMetrics(noteFont);
1047 QSize textSize = fontMetrics.size(Qt::TextSingleLine, noteKeyString);
1048
1049 int const distanceToBorder = 2;
1050 int const xOffset = borderWidth + distanceToBorder;
1051
1052 // noteTextHeight, textSize are not suitable for determining vertical spacing,
1053 // capHeight() can be used for this, but requires Qt 5.8.
1054 // We use boundingRect() with QChar (the QString version returns wrong value).
1055 QRect const boundingRect = fontMetrics.boundingRect(QChar::fromLatin1('H'));
1056 int const yOffset = (noteHeight - boundingRect.top() - boundingRect.bottom()) / 2;
1057
1058 if (textSize.width() < noteWidth - xOffset)
1059 {
1060 p.setPen(noteTextColor);
1061 p.setFont(noteFont);
1062 QPoint textStart(x + xOffset, y + yOffset);
1063
1064 p.drawText(textStart, noteKeyString);
1065 }
1066 }
1067 p.restore();
1068 }
1069
1070 // draw the note endmark, to hint the user to resize
1071 p.setBrush( col );
1072 if( width > 2 )
1073 {
1074 const int endmarkWidth = 3 - borderWidth;
1075 p.drawRect( x + noteWidth - endmarkWidth, y, endmarkWidth, noteHeight );
1076 }
1077}
1078
1079
1080
1081
1082void PianoRoll::drawDetuningInfo( QPainter & _p, const Note * _n, int _x,
1083 int _y ) const
1084{
1085 int middle_y = _y + m_keyLineHeight / 2;
1086 _p.setPen(m_noteColor);
1087 _p.setClipRect(
1088 m_whiteKeyWidth,
1089 PR_TOP_MARGIN,
1090 width() - m_whiteKeyWidth,
1091 keyAreaBottom() - PR_TOP_MARGIN);
1092
1093 // Draw lines for the detuning automation, treating cubic hermit curves
1094 // as straight lines for now. Also draw discrete jumps.
1095 int old_x = 0;
1096 int old_y = 0;
1097
1098 timeMap & map = _n->detuning()->automationClip()->getTimeMap();
1099 for (timeMap::const_iterator it = map.begin(); it != map.end(); ++it)
1100 {
1101 // Current node values
1102 int cur_ticks = POS(it);
1103 int cur_x = _x + cur_ticks * m_ppb / TimePos::ticksPerBar();
1104 const float cur_level = INVAL(it);
1105 int cur_y = middle_y - cur_level * m_keyLineHeight;
1106
1107 // First line to represent the inValue of the first node
1108 if (it == map.begin())
1109 {
1110 _p.drawLine(cur_x - 1, cur_y, cur_x + 1, cur_y);
1111 _p.drawLine(cur_x, cur_y - 1, cur_x, cur_y + 1);
1112 }
1113 // All subsequent lines will take the outValue of the previous node
1114 // and the inValue of the current node. It will also draw a vertical
1115 // line if there was a discrete jump (from old_x,old_y to pre_x,pre_y)
1116 else
1117 {
1118 // Previous node values (based on outValue). We just calculate
1119 // the y level because the x will be the same as old_x.
1120 const float pre_level = OUTVAL(it - 1);
1121 int pre_y = middle_y - pre_level * m_keyLineHeight;
1122
1123 // Draws the line representing the discrete jump if there's one
1124 if (old_y != pre_y)
1125 {
1126 _p.drawLine(old_x, old_y, old_x, pre_y);
1127 }
1128
1129 // Now draw the lines representing the actual progression from one
1130 // node to the other
1131 switch (_n->detuning()->automationClip()->progressionType())
1132 {
1133 case AutomationClip::ProgressionType::Discrete:
1134 _p.drawLine(old_x, pre_y, cur_x, pre_y);
1135 _p.drawLine(cur_x, pre_y, cur_x, cur_y);
1136 break;
1137 case AutomationClip::ProgressionType::CubicHermite: /* TODO */
1138 case AutomationClip::ProgressionType::Linear:
1139 _p.drawLine(old_x, pre_y, cur_x, cur_y);
1140 break;
1141 }
1142
1143 // If we are in the last node and there's a discrete jump, we draw a
1144 // vertical line representing it
1145 if ((it + 1) == map.end())
1146 {
1147 const float last_level = OUTVAL(it);
1148 if (cur_level != last_level)
1149 {
1150 int last_y = middle_y - last_level * m_keyLineHeight;
1151 _p.drawLine(cur_x, cur_y, cur_x, last_y);
1152 }
1153 }
1154 }
1155
1156 old_x = cur_x;
1157 old_y = cur_y;
1158 }
1159}

1187
1188void PianoRoll::shiftSemiTone(int amount) //Shift notes by amount semitones
1189{
1190 if (!hasValidMidiClip()) { return; }
1191
1192 auto selectedNotes = getSelectedNotes();
1193 //If no notes are selected, shift all of them, otherwise shift selection
1194 if (selectedNotes.empty()) { shiftSemiTone(m_midiClip->notes(), amount); }
1195 else { shiftSemiTone(selectedNotes, amount); }
1196}
1197
1198void PianoRoll::shiftSemiTone(const NoteVector& notes, int amount)
1199{
1200 m_midiClip->addJournalCheckPoint();
1201 for (Note *note : notes) { note->setKey( note->key() + amount ); }
1202
1203 m_midiClip->rearrangeAllNotes();
1204 m_midiClip->dataChanged();
1205 //We modified the song
1206 update();
1207 getGUI()->songEditor()->update();
1208}
1209
1210
1211
1212
1213void PianoRoll::shiftPos(int amount) //Shift notes pos by amount
1214{
1215 if (!hasValidMidiClip()) { return; }
1216
1217 auto selectedNotes = getSelectedNotes();
1218 //If no notes are selected, shift all of them, otherwise shift selection
1219 if (selectedNotes.empty()) { shiftPos(m_midiClip->notes(), amount); }
1220 else { shiftPos(selectedNotes, amount); }
1221}
1222
1223void PianoRoll::shiftPos(const NoteVector& notes, int amount)
1224{
1225 m_midiClip->addJournalCheckPoint();
1226
1227 if (notes.empty()) {
1228 return;
1229 }
1230
1231 auto leftMostPos = notes.front()->pos();
1232 //Limit leftwards shifts to prevent moving left of clip start
1233 auto shiftAmount = (leftMostPos > -amount) ? amount : -leftMostPos;
1234 if (shiftAmount == 0) { return; }
1235
1236 for (Note *note : notes) { note->setPos( note->pos() + shiftAmount ); }
1237
1238 m_midiClip->rearrangeAllNotes();
1239 m_midiClip->updateLength();
1240 m_midiClip->dataChanged();
1241 // we modified the song
1242 update();
1243 getGUI()->songEditor()->update();
1244}

1248
1249bool PianoRoll::isSelection() const // are any notes selected?
1250{
1251 for( const Note *note : m_midiClip->notes() )
1252 {
1253 if( note->selected() )
1254 {
1255 return true;
1256 }
1257 }
1258
1259 return false;
1260}

1264int PianoRoll::selectionCount() const // how many notes are selected?
1265{
1266 return getSelectedNotes().size();
1267}

1269
1270
1271void PianoRoll::keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent* ke)
1272{
1273 if(m_stepRecorder.isRecording())
1274 {
1275 bool handled = m_stepRecorder.keyPressEvent(ke);
1276 if(handled)
1277 {
1278 ke->accept();
1279 update();
1280 return;
1281 }
1282 }
1283
1284 if( hasValidMidiClip() && ke->modifiers() == Qt::NoModifier )
1285 {
1286 const int key_num = PianoView::getKeyFromKeyEvent( ke );
1287
1288 if (!ke->isAutoRepeat() && key_num > -1)
1289 {
1290 m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->pianoModel()->handleKeyPress(key_num);
1291 // if a chord is set, play all chord notes (simulate click on all):
1292 playChordNotes(key_num);
1293 ke->accept();
1294 return;
1295 }
1296 }
1297
1298 switch( ke->key() )
1299 {
1300 case Qt::Key_Up:
1301 case Qt::Key_Down:
1302 {
1303 int direction = (ke->key() == Qt::Key_Up ? +1 : -1);
1304 if( ( ke->modifiers() & Qt::ControlModifier ) && m_action == Action::None )
1305 {
1306 // shift selection by one octave
1307 // if nothing selected, shift _everything_
1308 if (hasValidMidiClip())
1309 {
1310 // An octave could potentially be greater or less than twelve semitones if the microtuner is in use.
1311 const auto microtuner = m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->microtuner();
1312 if (microtuner->enabled())
1313 {
1314 shiftSemiTone(microtuner->octaveSize() * direction);
1315 }
1316 else
1317 {
1318 shiftSemiTone(12 * direction);
1319 }
1320 }
1321 }
1322 else if((ke->modifiers() & Qt::ShiftModifier) && m_action == Action::None)
1323 {
1324 // Move selected notes by one semitone
1325 if (hasValidMidiClip())
1326 {
1327 shiftSemiTone( 1 * direction );
1328 }
1329 }
1330 else
1331 {
1332 // scroll
1333 m_topBottomScroll->setValue( m_topBottomScroll->value() -
1334 cm_scrollAmtVert * direction );
1335
1336 // if they are moving notes around or resizing,
1337 // recalculate the note/resize position
1338 if( m_action == Action::MoveNote ||
1339 m_action == Action::ResizeNote )
1340 {
1341 dragNotes(
1342 m_lastMouseX,
1343 m_lastMouseY,
1344 ke->modifiers() & Qt::AltModifier,
1345 ke->modifiers() & Qt::ShiftModifier,
1346 ke->modifiers() & Qt::ControlModifier
1347 );
1348 }
1349 }
1350 ke->accept();
1351 break;
1352 }
1353
1354 case Qt::Key_Right:
1355 case Qt::Key_Left:
1356 {
1357 int direction = (ke->key() == Qt::Key_Right ? +1 : -1);
1358 if( ke->modifiers() & Qt::ControlModifier && m_action == Action::None )
1359 {
1360 // Move selected notes by one bar to the left
1361 if (hasValidMidiClip())
1362 {
1363 shiftPos( direction * TimePos::ticksPerBar() );
1364 }
1365 }
1366 else if( ke->modifiers() & Qt::ShiftModifier && m_action == Action::None)
1367 {
1368 // move notes
1369 if (hasValidMidiClip())
1370 {
1371 bool quantized = ! ( ke->modifiers() & Qt::AltModifier );
1372 int amt = quantized ? quantization() : 1;
1373 shiftPos( direction * amt );
1374 }
1375 }
1376 else if( ke->modifiers() & Qt::AltModifier)
1377 {
1378 // switch to editing a clip adjacent to this one in the song editor
1379 if (hasValidMidiClip())
1380 {
1381 MidiClip * c = direction > 0 ? m_midiClip->nextMidiClip()
1382 : m_midiClip->previousMidiClip();
1383 if(c != nullptr)
1384 {
1385 setCurrentMidiClip(c);
1386 }
1387 }
1388 }
1389 else
1390 {
1391 // scroll
1392 m_leftRightScroll->setValue( m_leftRightScroll->value() +
1393 direction * cm_scrollAmtHoriz );
1394
1395 // if they are moving notes around or resizing,
1396 // recalculate the note/resize position
1397 if( m_action == Action::MoveNote ||
1398 m_action == Action::ResizeNote )
1399 {
1400 dragNotes(
1401 m_lastMouseX,
1402 m_lastMouseY,
1403 ke->modifiers() & Qt::AltModifier,
1404 ke->modifiers() & Qt::ShiftModifier,
1405 ke->modifiers() & Qt::ControlModifier
1406 );
1407 }
1408
1409 }
1410 ke->accept();
1411 break;
1412 }
1413
1414 case Qt::Key_A:
1415 if (ke->modifiers() & Qt::ControlModifier && m_editMode != EditMode::Strum && m_editMode != EditMode::Knife)
1416 {
1417 ke->accept();
1418 if (ke->modifiers() & Qt::ShiftModifier)
1419 {
1420 // Ctrl + Shift + A = deselect all notes
1421 clearSelectedNotes();
1422 }
1423 else
1424 {
1425 // Ctrl + A = select all notes
1426 selectAll();
1427 }
1428 update();
1429 }
1430 break;
1431
1432 case Qt::Key_Escape:
1433 // On the Knife mode or Strum mode, ESC cancels it
1434 if (m_editMode == EditMode::Knife)
1435 {
1436 cancelKnifeAction();
1437 }
1438 else if (m_editMode == EditMode::Strum)
1439 {
1440 cancelStrumAction();
1441 }
1442 else
1443 {
1444 // Same as Ctrl + Shift + A
1445 clearSelectedNotes();
1446 }
1447 break;
1448
1449 case Qt::Key_Backspace:
1450 case Qt::Key_Delete:
1451 deleteSelectedNotes();
1452 ke->accept();
1453 break;
1454
1455 case Qt::Key_Home:
1456 m_timeLine->pos().setTicks( 0 );
1457 m_timeLine->updatePosition();
1458 ke->accept();
1459 break;
1460
1461 case Qt::Key_0:
1462 case Qt::Key_1:
1463 case Qt::Key_2:
1464 case Qt::Key_3:
1465 case Qt::Key_4:
1466 case Qt::Key_5:
1467 case Qt::Key_6:
1468 case Qt::Key_7:
1469 case Qt::Key_8:
1470 case Qt::Key_9:
1471 {
1472 int len = 1 + ke->key() - Qt::Key_0;
1473 if( len == 10 )
1474 {
1475 len = 0;
1476 }
1477 if( ke->modifiers() & ( Qt::ControlModifier | Qt::KeypadModifier ) )
1478 {
1479 m_noteLenModel.setValue( len );
1480 ke->accept();
1481 }
1482 else if( ke->modifiers() & Qt::AltModifier )
1483 {
1484 m_quantizeModel.setValue( len );
1485 ke->accept();
1486 }
1487 break;
1488 }
1489
1490 case Qt::Key_Control:
1491 // Ctrl will not enter selection mode if we are
1492 // in Knife mode, but unquantize it
1493 if (m_editMode == EditMode::Knife)
1494 {
1495 break;
1496 }
1497 // Enter selection mode if:
1498 // -> this window is active
1499 // -> shift is not pressed
1500 // (<S-C-drag> is shortcut for sticky note resize)
1501 if ( !( ke->modifiers() & Qt::ShiftModifier ) && isActiveWindow() )
1502 {
1503 m_ctrlMode = m_editMode;
1504 m_editMode = EditMode::Select;
1505 setCursor( Qt::ArrowCursor );
1506 ke->accept();
1507 }
1508 break;
1509 default:
1510 ke->ignore();
1511 break;
1512 }
1513
1514 update();
1515}
1516
1517
1518
1519
1520void PianoRoll::keyReleaseEvent(QKeyEvent* ke )
1521{
1522 if( hasValidMidiClip() && ke->modifiers() == Qt::NoModifier )
1523 {
1524 const int key_num = PianoView::getKeyFromKeyEvent( ke );
1525 if (!ke->isAutoRepeat() && key_num > -1)
1526 {
1527 m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->pianoModel()->handleKeyRelease(key_num);
1528 // if a chord is set, simulate click release on all chord notes
1529 pauseChordNotes(key_num);
1530 ke->accept();
1531 return;
1532 }
1533 }
1534
1535 switch( ke->key() )
1536 {
1537 case Qt::Key_Control:
1538 if (m_editMode == EditMode::Knife)
1539 {
1540 break;
1541 }
1542 computeSelectedNotes( ke->modifiers() & Qt::ShiftModifier);
1543 m_editMode = m_ctrlMode;
1544 if (m_editMode == EditMode::Strum) { setupSelectedChords(); }
1545 update();
1546 break;
1547
1548 // update after undo/redo
1549 case Qt::Key_Z:
1550 case Qt::Key_R:
1551 if( hasValidMidiClip() && ke->modifiers() == Qt::ControlModifier )
1552 {
1553 update();
1554 }
1555 break;
1556 default:
1557 ke->ignore();
1558 break;
1559 }
1560
1561 update();
1562}
1563

1567void PianoRoll::leaveEvent(QEvent * e )
1568{
1569 QWidget::leaveEvent( e );
1570 s_textFloat->hide();
1571 update(); // cleaning inner mouse-related graphics
1572}

1622
1623
1624
1625void PianoRoll::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent * me )
1626{
1627 m_startedWithShift = me->modifiers() & Qt::ShiftModifier;
1628
1629 if( ! hasValidMidiClip() )
1630 {
1631 return;
1632 }
1633
1634 // -- Knife
1635 if (m_editMode == EditMode::Knife && me->button() == Qt::LeftButton)
1636 {
1637 updateKnifePos(me, true);
1638 m_knifeDown = true;
1639 update();
1640 return;
1641 }
1642
1643 if (m_editMode == EditMode::Strum && me->button() == Qt::LeftButton)
1644 {
1645 // Only strum if the user is dragging a selected note
1646 const auto& selectedNotes = getSelectedNotes();
1647 if (std::find(selectedNotes.begin(), selectedNotes.end(), noteUnderMouse()) != selectedNotes.end())
1648 {
1649 updateStrumPos(me, true, me->modifiers() & Qt::ShiftModifier);
1650 m_strumEnabled = true;
1651 update();
1652 }
1653 return;
1654 }
1655
1656 if( m_editMode == EditMode::Detuning && noteUnderMouse() )
1657 {
1658 static QPointer<AutomationClip> detuningClip = nullptr;
1659 if (detuningClip.data() != nullptr)
1660 {
1661 detuningClip->disconnect(this);
1662 }
1663 Note* n = noteUnderMouse();
1664 if (n->detuning() == nullptr)
1665 {
1666 n->createDetuning();
1667 }
1668 detuningClip = n->detuning()->automationClip();
1669 connect(detuningClip.data(), SIGNAL(dataChanged()), this, SLOT(update()));
1670 getGUI()->automationEditor()->setGhostMidiClip(m_midiClip);
1671 getGUI()->automationEditor()->open(detuningClip);
1672 return;
1673 }
1674
1675 // if holding control, go to selection mode unless shift is also pressed
1676 if( me->modifiers() & Qt::ControlModifier && m_editMode != EditMode::Select )
1677 {
1678 m_ctrlMode = m_editMode;
1679 m_editMode = EditMode::Select;
1680 setCursor( Qt::ArrowCursor );
1681 update();
1682 }
1683
1684 // keep track of the point where the user clicked down
1685 if( me->button() == Qt::LeftButton )
1686 {
1687 m_moveStartX = me->x();
1688 m_moveStartY = me->y();
1689 }
1690
1691 if(me->button() == Qt::LeftButton &&
1692 me->y() > keyAreaBottom() && me->y() < noteEditTop())
1693 {
1694 // resizing the note edit area
1695 m_action = Action::ResizeNoteEditArea;
1696 return;
1697 }
1698
1699 if( me->y() > PR_TOP_MARGIN )
1700 {
1701 bool edit_note = ( me->y() > noteEditTop() );
1702
1703 int key_num = getKey( me->y() );
1704
1705 int x = me->x();
1706
1707
1708 if (x > m_whiteKeyWidth)
1709 {
1710 // set, move or resize note
1711
1712 x -= m_whiteKeyWidth;
1713
1714 // get tick in which the user clicked
1715 int pos_ticks = x * TimePos::ticksPerBar() / m_ppb +
1716 m_currentPosition;
1717
1718
1719 // get note-vector of current MIDI clip
1720 const NoteVector & notes = m_midiClip->notes();
1721
1722 // will be our iterator in the following loop
1723 auto it = notes.rbegin();
1724
1725 // loop through whole note-vector...
1726 while (it != notes.rend())
1727 {
1728 Note *note = *it;
1729 TimePos len = note->length();
1730 if( len < 0 )
1731 {
1732 len = 4;
1733 }
1734 // and check whether the user clicked on an
1735 // existing note or an edit-line
1736 if( pos_ticks >= note->pos() &&
1737 len > 0 &&
1738 (
1739 ( ! edit_note &&
1740 pos_ticks <= note->pos() + len &&
1741 note->key() == key_num )
1742 ||
1743 ( edit_note &&
1744 pos_ticks <= note->pos() +
1745 NOTE_EDIT_LINE_WIDTH * TimePos::ticksPerBar() / m_ppb )
1746 )
1747 )
1748 {
1749 break;
1750 }
1751 ++it;
1752 }
1753
1754 // first check whether the user clicked in note-edit-
1755 // area
1756 if( edit_note )
1757 {
1758 m_midiClip->addJournalCheckPoint();
1759 // scribble note edit changes
1760 mouseMoveEvent( me );
1761 return;
1762 }
1763 // left button??
1764 else if( me->button() == Qt::LeftButton &&
1765 m_editMode == EditMode::Draw )
1766 {
1767 // whether this action creates new note(s) or not
1768 bool is_new_note = false;
1769
1770 Note * created_new_note = nullptr;
1771 // did it reach end of vector because
1772 // there's no note??
1773 if (it == notes.rend())
1774 {
1775 is_new_note = true;
1776 m_midiClip->addJournalCheckPoint();
1777
1778 // then set new note
1779
1780 // clear selection and select this new note
1781 clearSelectedNotes();
1782
1783 // +32 to quanitize the note correctly when placing notes with
1784 // the mouse. We do this here instead of in note.quantized
1785 // because live notes should still be quantized at the half.
1786 TimePos note_pos( pos_ticks - ( quantization() / 2 ) );
1787 TimePos note_len( newNoteLen() );
1788
1789 Note new_note( note_len, note_pos, key_num );
1790 new_note.setSelected( true );
1791 new_note.setPanning( m_lastNotePanning );
1792 new_note.setVolume( m_lastNoteVolume );
1793 created_new_note = m_midiClip->addNote( new_note );
1794
1795 const InstrumentFunctionNoteStacking::Chord & chord = InstrumentFunctionNoteStacking::ChordTable::getInstance()
1796 .getChordByName( m_chordModel.currentText() );
1797
1798 if( ! chord.isEmpty() )
1799 {
1800 // if a chord is selected, create following notes in chord
1801 // or arpeggio mode
1802 const bool arpeggio = me->modifiers() & Qt::ShiftModifier;
1803 for( int i = 1; i < chord.size(); i++ )
1804 {
1805 if( arpeggio )
1806 {
1807 note_pos += note_len;
1808 }
1809 Note new_note( note_len, note_pos, key_num + chord[i] );
1810 new_note.setSelected( true );
1811 new_note.setPanning( m_lastNotePanning );
1812 new_note.setVolume( m_lastNoteVolume );
1813 m_midiClip->addNote( new_note );
1814 }
1815 }
1816
1817 // reset it so that it can be used for
1818 // ops (move, resize) after this
1819 // code-block
1820 it = notes.rbegin();
1821 while (it != notes.rend() && *it != created_new_note)
1822 {
1823 ++it;
1824 }
1825 }
1826
1827 Note *current_note = *it;
1828 m_currentNote = current_note;
1829 m_lastNotePanning = current_note->getPanning();
1830 m_lastNoteVolume = current_note->getVolume();
1831 m_lenOfNewNotes = current_note->length();
1832
1833 // remember which key and tick we started with
1834 m_mouseDownKey = m_startKey;
1835 m_mouseDownTick = m_currentPosition;
1836
1837 //If clicked on an unselected note, remove selection and select that new note
1838 if (!m_currentNote->selected())
1839 {
1840 clearSelectedNotes();
1841 m_currentNote->setSelected( true );
1842 }
1843
1844 auto selectedNotes = getSelectedNotes();
1845
1846 m_moveBoundaryLeft = selectedNotes.front()->pos().getTicks();
1847 m_moveBoundaryRight = selectedNotes.front()->endPos();
1848 m_moveBoundaryBottom = selectedNotes.front()->key();
1849 m_moveBoundaryTop = m_moveBoundaryBottom;
1850
1851 //Figure out the bounding box of all the selected notes
1852 for (Note *note: selectedNotes)
1853 {
1854 // remember note starting positions
1855 note->setOldKey( note->key() );
1856 note->setOldPos( note->pos() );
1857 note->setOldLength( note->length() );
1858
1859 m_moveBoundaryLeft = qMin(note->pos().getTicks(), (tick_t) m_moveBoundaryLeft);
1860 m_moveBoundaryRight = qMax((int) note->endPos(), m_moveBoundaryRight);
1861 m_moveBoundaryBottom = qMin(note->key(), m_moveBoundaryBottom);
1862 m_moveBoundaryTop = qMax(note->key(), m_moveBoundaryTop);
1863 }
1864
1865 // clicked at the "tail" of the note?
1866 if( pos_ticks * m_ppb / TimePos::ticksPerBar() >
1867 m_currentNote->endPos() * m_ppb / TimePos::ticksPerBar() - RESIZE_AREA_WIDTH
1868 && m_currentNote->length() > 0 )
1869 {
1870 m_midiClip->addJournalCheckPoint();
1871 // then resize the note
1872 m_action = Action::ResizeNote;
1873
1874 //Calculate the minimum length we should allow when resizing
1875 //each note, and let all notes use the smallest one found
1876 m_minResizeLen = quantization();
1877 for (Note *note : selectedNotes)
1878 {
1879 //Notes from the pattern editor can have a negative length, so
1880 //change their length to the displayed one before resizing
1881 if (note->oldLength() <= 0) { note->setOldLength(4); }
1882 //Let the note be sized down by quantized increments, stopping
1883 //when the next step down would result in a negative length
1884 int thisMin = note->oldLength() % quantization();
1885 //The initial value for m_minResizeLen is the minimum length of
1886 //a note divisible by the current Q. Therefore we ignore notes
1887 //where thisMin == 0 when checking for a new minimum
1888 if (thisMin > 0 && thisMin < m_minResizeLen) { m_minResizeLen = thisMin; }
1889 }
1890
1891 // set resize-cursor
1892 setCursor( Qt::SizeHorCursor );
1893 }
1894 else
1895 {
1896 if( ! created_new_note )
1897 {
1898 m_midiClip->addJournalCheckPoint();
1899 }
1900
1901 // otherwise move it
1902 m_action = Action::MoveNote;
1903
1904 // set move-cursor
1905 setCursor( Qt::SizeAllCursor );
1906
1907 // if they're holding shift, copy all selected notes
1908 if( ! is_new_note && me->modifiers() & Qt::ShiftModifier )
1909 {
1910 for (Note *note: selectedNotes)
1911 {
1912 Note *newNote = m_midiClip->addNote(*note, false);
1913 newNote->setSelected(false);
1914 }
1915
1916 if (!selectedNotes.empty())
1917 {
1918 // added new notes, so must update engine, song, etc
1919 Engine::getSong()->setModified();
1920 update();
1921 getGUI()->songEditor()->update();
1922 }
1923 }
1924
1925 // play the note
1926 testPlayNote( m_currentNote );
1927 }
1928
1929 Engine::getSong()->setModified();
1930 }
1931 else if( ( me->buttons() == Qt::RightButton &&
1932 m_editMode == EditMode::Draw ) ||
1933 m_editMode == EditMode::Erase )
1934 {
1935 // erase single note
1936 m_mouseDownRight = true;
1937 if (it != notes.rend())
1938 {
1939 m_midiClip->addJournalCheckPoint();
1940 m_midiClip->removeNote( *it );
1941 Engine::getSong()->setModified();
1942 }
1943 }
1944 else if( me->button() == Qt::LeftButton &&
1945 m_editMode == EditMode::Select )
1946 {
1947 // select an area of notes
1948
1949 m_selectStartTick = pos_ticks;
1950 m_selectedTick = 0;
1951 m_selectStartKey = key_num;
1952 m_selectedKeys = 1;
1953 m_action = Action::SelectNotes;
1954
1955 // call mousemove to fix glitch where selection
1956 // appears in wrong spot on mousedown
1957 mouseMoveEvent( me );
1958 }
1959
1960 update();
1961 }
1962 else if( me->y() < keyAreaBottom() )
1963 {
1964 // reference to last key needed for both
1965 // right click (used for copy all keys on note)
1966 // and for playing the key when left-clicked
1967 m_lastKey = key_num;
1968
1969 // clicked on keyboard on the left
1970 if( me->buttons() == Qt::RightButton )
1971 {
1972 // right click - tone marker contextual menu
1973 m_pianoKeySelected = getKey( me->y() );
1974 m_semiToneMarkerMenu->popup( mapToGlobal( QPoint( me->x(), me->y() ) ) );
1975 }
1976 else if( me->buttons() == Qt::LeftButton )
1977 {
1978 // left click - play the note
1979 int v = ((float) x) / ((float) m_whiteKeyWidth) * MidiDefaultVelocity;
1980 m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->pianoModel()->handleKeyPress(key_num, v);
1981 // if a chord is set, play the chords notes as well:
1982 playChordNotes(key_num, v);
1983 }
1984 }
1985 else
1986 {
1987 if( me->buttons() == Qt::LeftButton )
1988 {
1989 // clicked in the box below the keys to the left of note edit area
1990 m_noteEditMode = (NoteEditMode)(((int)m_noteEditMode)+1);
1991 if( m_noteEditMode == NoteEditMode::Count )
1992 {
1993 m_noteEditMode = (NoteEditMode) 0;
1994 }
1995 repaint();
1996 }
1997 else if( me->buttons() == Qt::RightButton )
1998 {
1999 // pop menu asking which one they want to edit
2000 m_noteEditMenu->popup( mapToGlobal( QPoint( me->x(), me->y() ) ) );
2001 }
2002 }
2003 }
2004}
2005
2006
2007
2008
2009void PianoRoll::mouseDoubleClickEvent(QMouseEvent * me )
2010{
2011 if( ! hasValidMidiClip() )
2012 {
2013 return;
2014 }
2015
2016 // if they clicked in the note edit area, enter value for the volume bar
2017 if( me->x() > noteEditLeft() && me->x() < noteEditRight()
2018 && me->y() > noteEditTop() && me->y() < noteEditBottom() )
2019 {
2020 // get values for going through notes
2021 int pixel_range = 4;
2022 int x = me->x() - m_whiteKeyWidth;
2023 const int ticks_start = ( x-pixel_range/2 ) *
2024 TimePos::ticksPerBar() / m_ppb + m_currentPosition;
2025 const int ticks_end = ( x+pixel_range/2 ) *
2026 TimePos::ticksPerBar() / m_ppb + m_currentPosition;
2027 const int ticks_middle = x * TimePos::ticksPerBar() / m_ppb + m_currentPosition;
2028
2029 // go through notes to figure out which one we want to change
2030 bool altPressed = me->modifiers() & Qt::AltModifier;
2031 NoteVector nv;
2032 for ( Note * i : m_midiClip->notes() )
2033 {
2034 if( i->withinRange( ticks_start, ticks_end ) || ( i->selected() && !altPressed ) )
2035 {
2036 nv.push_back(i);
2037 }
2038 }
2039 // make sure we're on a note
2040 if( nv.size() > 0 )
2041 {
2042 const Note * closest = nullptr;
2043 int closest_dist = 9999999;
2044 // if we caught multiple notes and we're not editing a
2045 // selection, find the closest...
2046 if( nv.size() > 1 && !isSelection() )
2047 {
2048 for ( const Note * i : nv )
2049 {
2050 const int dist = qAbs( i->pos().getTicks() - ticks_middle );
2051 if( dist < closest_dist ) { closest = i; closest_dist = dist; }
2052 }
2053 // ... then remove all notes from the vector that aren't on the same exact time
2054 auto it = nv.begin();
2055 while (it != nv.end())
2056 {
2057 const Note *note = *it;
2058 if( note->pos().getTicks() != closest->pos().getTicks() )
2059 {
2060 it = nv.erase( it );
2061 }
2062 else
2063 {
2064 it++;
2065 }
2066 }
2067 }
2068 enterValue( &nv );
2069 }
2070 }
2071 else
2072 {
2073 QWidget::mouseDoubleClickEvent(me);
2074 }
2075}
2076
2077
2078
2079
2080void PianoRoll::testPlayNote( Note * n )
2081{
2082 m_lastKey = n->key();
2083
2084 if( ! n->isPlaying() && ! m_recording && ! m_stepRecorder.isRecording())
2085 {
2086 n->setIsPlaying( true );
2087
2088 const int baseVelocity = m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->midiPort()->baseVelocity();
2089
2090 m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->pianoModel()->handleKeyPress(n->key(), n->midiVelocity(baseVelocity));
2091
2092 // if a chord is set, play the chords notes as well:
2093 playChordNotes(n->key(), n->midiVelocity(baseVelocity));
2094
2095 MidiEvent event( MidiMetaEvent, -1, n->key(), panningToMidi( n->getPanning() ) );
2096
2097 event.setMetaEvent( MidiNotePanning );
2098
2099 m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->processInEvent( event, 0 );
2100 }
2101}

2104
2105
2106void PianoRoll::pauseTestNotes( bool pause )
2107{
2108 for (Note *note : m_midiClip->notes())
2109 {
2110 if( note->isPlaying() )
2111 {
2112 if( pause )
2113 {
2114 // stop note
2115 m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->pianoModel()->handleKeyRelease( note->key() );
2116
2117 // if a chord was set, stop the chords notes as well:
2118 pauseChordNotes(note->key());
2119 }
2120 else
2121 {
2122 // start note
2123 note->setIsPlaying( false );
2124 testPlayNote( note );
2125 }
2126 }
2127 }
2128}
2129
2130void PianoRoll::playChordNotes(int key, int velocity)
2131{
2132 // if a chord is set, play the chords notes beside the base note.
2133 Piano *pianoModel = m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->pianoModel();
2134 const InstrumentFunctionNoteStacking::Chord & chord =
2135 InstrumentFunctionNoteStacking::ChordTable::getInstance().getChordByName(
2136 m_chordModel.currentText());
2137 if (!chord.isEmpty())
2138 {
2139 for (int i = 1; i < chord.size(); ++i)
2140 {
2141 pianoModel->handleKeyPress(key + chord[i], velocity);
2142 }
2143 }
2144}
2145
2146void PianoRoll::pauseChordNotes(int key)
2147{
2148 // if a chord was set, stop the chords notes beside the base note.
2149 Piano *pianoModel = m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->pianoModel();
2150 const InstrumentFunctionNoteStacking::Chord & chord =
2151 InstrumentFunctionNoteStacking::ChordTable::getInstance().getChordByName(
2152 m_chordModel.currentText());
2153 if (!chord.isEmpty())
2154 {
2155 for (int i = 1; i < chord.size(); ++i)
2156 {
2157 pianoModel->handleKeyRelease(key + chord[i]);
2158 }
2159 }
2160}
2161
2162void PianoRoll::setKnifeAction()
2163{
2164 if (m_editMode != EditMode::Knife)
2165 {
2166 m_knifeMode = m_editMode;
2167 m_editMode = EditMode::Knife;
2168 m_action = Action::Knife;
2169 m_knifeDown = false;
2170 setCursor(Qt::ArrowCursor);
2171 update();
2172 }
2173}
2174
2175void PianoRoll::cancelKnifeAction()
2176{
2177 m_editMode = m_knifeMode;
2178 m_action = Action::None;
2179 m_knifeDown = false;
2180 update();
2181}
2182
2183void PianoRoll::setStrumAction()
2184{
2185 if (m_editMode != EditMode::Strum)
2186 {
2187 m_strumMode = m_editMode;
2188 m_editMode = EditMode::Strum;
2189 m_action = Action::Strum;
2190 m_strumEnabled = false;
2191 setupSelectedChords();
2192 setCursor(Qt::ArrowCursor);
2193 update();
2194 }
2195}
2196
2197void PianoRoll::cancelStrumAction()
2198{
2199 m_editMode = m_strumMode;
2200 m_action = Action::None;
2201 m_strumEnabled = false;
2202 update();
2203}
2204
2205void PianoRoll::testPlayKey( int key, int velocity, int pan )
2206{
2207 Piano *pianoModel = m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->pianoModel();
2208 // turn off old key
2209 pianoModel->handleKeyRelease( m_lastKey );
2210 // if a chord was set, stop the chords notes as well
2211 pauseChordNotes(m_lastKey);
2212
2213 // remember which one we're playing
2214 m_lastKey = key;
2215
2216 // play new key
2217 pianoModel->handleKeyPress( key, velocity );
2218 // and if a chord is set, play chord notes:
2219 playChordNotes(key, velocity);
2220}
2221
2222
2223
2224
2225void PianoRoll::computeSelectedNotes(bool shift)
2226{
2227 if( m_selectStartTick == 0 &&
2228 m_selectedTick == 0 &&
2229 m_selectStartKey == 0 &&
2230 m_selectedKeys == 0 )
2231 {
2232 // don't bother, there's no selection
2233 return;
2234 }
2235
2236 // setup selection-vars
2237 int sel_pos_start = m_selectStartTick;
2238 int sel_pos_end = m_selectStartTick+m_selectedTick;
2239 if( sel_pos_start > sel_pos_end )
2240 {
2241 qSwap<int>( sel_pos_start, sel_pos_end );
2242 }
2243
2244 int sel_key_start = m_selectStartKey - m_startKey + 1;
2245 int sel_key_end = sel_key_start + m_selectedKeys;
2246 if( sel_key_start > sel_key_end )
2247 {
2248 qSwap<int>( sel_key_start, sel_key_end );
2249 }
2250
2251 //int y_base = noteEditTop() - 1;
2252 if( hasValidMidiClip() )
2253 {
2254 for( Note *note : m_midiClip->notes() )
2255 {
2256 // make a new selection unless they're holding shift
2257 if( ! shift )
2258 {
2259 note->setSelected( false );
2260 }
2261
2262 int len_ticks = note->length();
2263
2264 if( len_ticks == 0 )
2265 {
2266 continue;
2267 }
2268 else if( len_ticks < 0 )
2269 {
2270 len_ticks = 4;
2271 }
2272
2273 const int key = note->key() - m_startKey + 1;
2274
2275 int pos_ticks = note->pos();
2276
2277 // if the selection even barely overlaps the note
2278 if( key > sel_key_start &&
2279 key <= sel_key_end &&
2280 pos_ticks + len_ticks > sel_pos_start &&
2281 pos_ticks < sel_pos_end )
2282 {
2283 // remove from selection when holding shift
2284 bool selected = shift && note->selected();
2285 note->setSelected( ! selected);
2286 }
2287 }
2288 }
2289
2290 removeSelection();
2291 update();
2292}

2296
2297void PianoRoll::mouseReleaseEvent( QMouseEvent * me )
2298{
2299 bool mustRepaint = false;
2300
2301 s_textFloat->hide();
2302
2303 // Quit knife mode or strum mode if we pressed and released the right mouse button
2304 if (m_editMode == EditMode::Knife && me->button() == Qt::RightButton)
2305 {
2306 cancelKnifeAction();
2307 }
2308 else if (m_editMode == EditMode::Strum && me->button() == Qt::RightButton)
2309 {
2310 cancelStrumAction();
2311 }
2312
2313 if( me->button() & Qt::LeftButton )
2314 {
2315 mustRepaint = true;
2316
2317 if( m_action == Action::SelectNotes && m_editMode == EditMode::Select )
2318 {
2319 // select the notes within the selection rectangle and
2320 // then destroy the selection rectangle
2321 computeSelectedNotes(
2322 me->modifiers() & Qt::ShiftModifier );
2323 }
2324 else if( m_action == Action::MoveNote )
2325 {
2326 // we moved one or more notes so they have to be
2327 // moved properly according to new starting-
2328 // time in the note-array of clip
2329 m_midiClip->rearrangeAllNotes();
2330
2331 }
2332 else if (m_action == Action::Strum || m_strumEnabled)
2333 {
2334 m_strumEnabled = false;
2335 }
2336 else if (m_action == Action::Knife && hasValidMidiClip())
2337 {
2338 bool deleteShortEnds = me->modifiers() & Qt::ShiftModifier;
2339 const NoteVector selectedNotes = getSelectedNotes();
2340 m_midiClip->splitNotesAlongLine(!selectedNotes.empty() ? selectedNotes : m_midiClip->notes(), TimePos(m_knifeStartTickPos), m_knifeStartKey, TimePos(m_knifeEndTickPos), m_knifeEndKey, deleteShortEnds);
2341 m_knifeDown = false;
2342 }
2343
2344 if( m_action == Action::MoveNote || m_action == Action::ResizeNote )
2345 {
2346 // if we only moved one note, deselect it so we can
2347 // edit the notes in the note edit area
2348 if( selectionCount() == 1 )
2349 {
2350 clearSelectedNotes();
2351 }
2352 }
2353 }
2354
2355 if( me->button() & Qt::RightButton )
2356 {
2357 m_mouseDownRight = false;
2358 mustRepaint = true;
2359 }
2360
2361 if( hasValidMidiClip() )
2362 {
2363 // turn off all notes that are playing
2364 for ( Note *note : m_midiClip->notes() )
2365 {
2366 if( note->isPlaying() )
2367 {
2368 m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->pianoModel()->
2369 handleKeyRelease( note->key() );
2370 pauseChordNotes(note->key());
2371 note->setIsPlaying( false );
2372 }
2373 }
2374
2375 // stop playing keys that we let go of
2376 m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->pianoModel()->
2377 handleKeyRelease( m_lastKey );
2378 pauseChordNotes(m_lastKey);
2379 }
2380
2381 m_currentNote = nullptr;
2382
2383 if (m_action != Action::Knife && m_action != Action::Strum)
2384 {
2385 m_action = Action::None;
2386 }
2387
2388 if( m_editMode == EditMode::Draw )
2389 {
2390 setCursor( Qt::ArrowCursor );
2391 }
2392
2393 if( mustRepaint )
2394 {
2395 repaint();
2396 }
2397}

2400
2401
2402void PianoRoll::mouseMoveEvent( QMouseEvent * me )
2403{
2404 if( ! hasValidMidiClip() )
2405 {
2406 update();
2407 return;
2408 }
2409
2410 if( m_action == Action::None && me->buttons() == 0 )
2411 {
2412 // When cursor is between note editing area and volume/panning
2413 // area show vertical size cursor.
2414 if( me->y() > keyAreaBottom() && me->y() < noteEditTop() )
2415 {
2416 setCursor( Qt::SizeVerCursor );
2417 return;
2418 }
2419 }
2420 else if( m_action == Action::ResizeNoteEditArea )
2421 {
2422 // Don't try to show more keys than the full keyboard, bail if trying to
2423 if (m_pianoKeysVisible == NumKeys && me->y() > m_moveStartY)
2424 {
2425 return;
2426 }
2427 int newHeight = height() - me->y();
2428 if (me->y() < KEY_AREA_MIN_HEIGHT)
2429 {
2430 newHeight = height() - KEY_AREA_MIN_HEIGHT -
2431 PR_TOP_MARGIN - PR_BOTTOM_MARGIN; // - NOTE_EDIT_RESIZE_BAR
2432 }
2433 // change m_notesEditHeight and then repaint
2434 m_notesEditHeight = qMax(NOTE_EDIT_MIN_HEIGHT, newHeight);
2435 m_userSetNotesEditHeight = m_notesEditHeight;
2436 m_stepRecorderWidget.setBottomMargin(PR_BOTTOM_MARGIN + m_notesEditHeight);
2437 updateScrollbars();
2438 updatePositionLineHeight();
2439 repaint();
2440 return;
2441 }
2442
2443 // Update Knife position if we are on knife mode
2444 if (m_editMode == EditMode::Knife)
2445 {
2446 updateKnifePos(me, false);
2447 }
2448
2449 // Update Strum position if we are on knife mode
2450 if (m_editMode == EditMode::Strum && m_strumEnabled)
2451 {
2452 updateStrumPos(me, false, me->modifiers() & Qt::ShiftModifier);
2453 }
2454
2455 if( me->y() > PR_TOP_MARGIN || m_action != Action::None )
2456 {
2457 bool edit_note = ( me->y() > noteEditTop() )
2458 && m_action != Action::SelectNotes;
2459
2460
2461 int key_num = getKey( me->y() );
2462 int x = me->x();
2463
2464 // see if they clicked on the keyboard on the left
2465 if (x < m_whiteKeyWidth && m_action == Action::None
2466 && ! edit_note && key_num != m_lastKey
2467 && me->buttons() & Qt::LeftButton )
2468 {
2469 // clicked on a key, play the note
2470 testPlayKey(key_num, ((float) x) / ((float) m_whiteKeyWidth) * MidiDefaultVelocity, 0);
2471 update();
2472 return;
2473 }
2474
2475 x -= m_whiteKeyWidth;
2476
2477 if( me->buttons() & Qt::LeftButton
2478 && m_editMode == EditMode::Draw
2479 && (m_action == Action::MoveNote || m_action == Action::ResizeNote ) )
2480 {
2481 // handle moving notes and resizing them
2482 bool replay_note = key_num != m_lastKey
2483 && m_action == Action::MoveNote;
2484
2485 if( replay_note || ( m_action == Action::MoveNote && ( me->modifiers() & Qt::ShiftModifier ) && ! m_startedWithShift ) )
2486 {
2487 pauseTestNotes();
2488 }
2489
2490 dragNotes(
2491 me->x(),
2492 me->y(),
2493 me->modifiers() & Qt::AltModifier,
2494 me->modifiers() & Qt::ShiftModifier,
2495 me->modifiers() & Qt::ControlModifier
2496 );
2497
2498 if( replay_note && m_action == Action::MoveNote && ! ( ( me->modifiers() & Qt::ShiftModifier ) && ! m_startedWithShift ) )
2499 {
2500 pauseTestNotes( false );
2501 }
2502 }
2503 else if( m_editMode != EditMode::Erase &&
2504 ( edit_note || m_action == Action::ChangeNoteProperty ) &&
2505 ( me->buttons() & Qt::LeftButton || me->buttons() & Qt::MiddleButton
2506 || ( me->buttons() & Qt::RightButton && me->modifiers() & Qt::ShiftModifier ) ) )
2507 {
2508 // editing note properties
2509
2510 // Change notes within a certain pixel range of where
2511 // the mouse cursor is
2512 int pixel_range = 14;
2513
2514 // convert to ticks so that we can check which notes
2515 // are in the range
2516 int ticks_start = ( x-pixel_range/2 ) *
2517 TimePos::ticksPerBar() / m_ppb + m_currentPosition;
2518 int ticks_end = ( x+pixel_range/2 ) *
2519 TimePos::ticksPerBar() / m_ppb + m_currentPosition;
2520
2521 // get note-vector of current MIDI clip
2522 const NoteVector & notes = m_midiClip->notes();
2523
2524 // determine what volume/panning to set note to
2525 // if middle-click, set to defaults
2526 volume_t vol = DefaultVolume;
2527 panning_t pan = DefaultPanning;
2528
2529 if( me->buttons() & Qt::LeftButton )
2530 {
2531 vol = qBound<int>( MinVolume,
2532 MinVolume +
2533 ( ( (float)noteEditBottom() ) - ( (float)me->y() ) ) /
2534 ( (float)( noteEditBottom() - noteEditTop() ) ) *
2535 ( MaxVolume - MinVolume ),
2536 MaxVolume );
2537 pan = qBound<int>( PanningLeft,
2538 PanningLeft +
2539 ( (float)( noteEditBottom() - me->y() ) ) /
2540 ( (float)( noteEditBottom() - noteEditTop() ) ) *
2541 ( (float)( PanningRight - PanningLeft ) ),
2542 PanningRight);
2543 }
2544
2545 if( m_noteEditMode == NoteEditMode::Volume )
2546 {
2547 m_lastNoteVolume = vol;
2548 showVolTextFloat( vol, me->pos() );
2549 }
2550 else if( m_noteEditMode == NoteEditMode::Panning )
2551 {
2552 m_lastNotePanning = pan;
2553 showPanTextFloat( pan, me->pos() );
2554 }
2555
2556 // When alt is pressed we only edit the note under the cursor
2557 bool altPressed = me->modifiers() & Qt::AltModifier;
2558 // We iterate from last note in MIDI clip to the first,
2559 // chronologically
2560 auto it = notes.rbegin();
2561 while (it != notes.rend())
2562 {
2563 Note* n = *it;
2564
2565 bool isUnderPosition = n->withinRange( ticks_start, ticks_end );
2566 // Play note under the cursor
2567 if ( isUnderPosition ) { testPlayNote( n ); }
2568 // If note is:
2569 // Under the cursor, when there is no selection
2570 // Selected, and alt is not pressed
2571 // Under the cursor, selected, and alt is pressed
2572 if ( ( isUnderPosition && !isSelection() ) ||
2573 ( n->selected() && !altPressed ) ||
2574 ( isUnderPosition && n->selected() && altPressed )
2575 )
2576 {
2577 if( m_noteEditMode == NoteEditMode::Volume )
2578 {
2579 n->setVolume( vol );
2580
2581 const int baseVelocity = m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->midiPort()->baseVelocity();
2582
2583 m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->processInEvent( MidiEvent( MidiKeyPressure, -1, n->key(), n->midiVelocity( baseVelocity ) ) );
2584 }
2585 else if( m_noteEditMode == NoteEditMode::Panning )
2586 {
2587 n->setPanning( pan );
2588 MidiEvent evt( MidiMetaEvent, -1, n->key(), panningToMidi( pan ) );
2589 evt.setMetaEvent( MidiNotePanning );
2590 m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->processInEvent( evt );
2591 }
2592 }
2593 else if( n->isPlaying() && !isSelection() )
2594 {
2595 // mouse not over this note, stop playing it.
2596 m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->pianoModel()->handleKeyRelease( n->key() );
2597 pauseChordNotes(n->key());
2598
2599 n->setIsPlaying( false );
2600 }
2601
2602
2603 ++it;
2604 }
2605
2606 // Emit MIDI clip has changed
2607 m_midiClip->dataChanged();
2608 }
2609
2610 else if( me->buttons() == Qt::NoButton && m_editMode == EditMode::Draw )
2611 {
2612 // set move- or resize-cursor
2613
2614 // get tick in which the cursor is posated
2615 int pos_ticks = ( x * TimePos::ticksPerBar() ) /
2616 m_ppb + m_currentPosition;
2617
2618 // get note-vector of current MIDI clip
2619 const NoteVector & notes = m_midiClip->notes();
2620
2621 // will be our iterator in the following loop
2622 auto it = notes.rbegin();
2623
2624 // loop through whole note-vector...
2625 while (it != notes.rend())
2626 {
2627 Note *note = *it;
2628 // and check whether the cursor is over an
2629 // existing note
2630 if( pos_ticks >= note->pos() &&
2631 pos_ticks <= note->pos() +
2632 note->length() &&
2633 note->key() == key_num &&
2634 note->length() > 0 )
2635 {
2636 break;
2637 }
2638 ++it;
2639 }
2640
2641 // did it reach end of vector because there's
2642 // no note??
2643 if (it != notes.rend())
2644 {
2645 Note *note = *it;
2646 // x coordinate of the right edge of the note
2647 int noteRightX = ( note->pos() + note->length() -
2648 m_currentPosition) * m_ppb/TimePos::ticksPerBar();
2649 // cursor at the "tail" of the note?
2650 bool atTail = note->length() > 0 && x > noteRightX -
2651 RESIZE_AREA_WIDTH;
2652 Qt::CursorShape cursorShape = atTail ? Qt::SizeHorCursor :
2653 Qt::SizeAllCursor;
2654 setCursor( cursorShape );
2655 }
2656 else
2657 {
2658 // the cursor is over no note, so restore cursor
2659 setCursor( Qt::ArrowCursor );
2660 }
2661 }
2662 else if( me->buttons() & Qt::LeftButton &&
2663 m_editMode == EditMode::Select &&
2664 m_action == Action::SelectNotes )
2665 {
2666 // change size of selection
2667
2668 // get tick in which the cursor is posated
2669 int pos_ticks = x * TimePos::ticksPerBar() / m_ppb +
2670 m_currentPosition;
2671
2672 m_selectedTick = pos_ticks - m_selectStartTick;
2673 if( (int) m_selectStartTick + m_selectedTick < 0 )
2674 {
2675 m_selectedTick = -static_cast<int>(
2676 m_selectStartTick );
2677 }
2678 m_selectedKeys = key_num - m_selectStartKey;
2679 if( key_num <= m_selectStartKey )
2680 {
2681 --m_selectedKeys;
2682 }
2683 }
2684 else if( ( m_editMode == EditMode::Draw && me->buttons() & Qt::RightButton )
2685 || ( m_editMode == EditMode::Erase && me->buttons() ) )
2686 {
2687 // holding down right-click to delete notes or holding down
2688 // any key if in erase mode
2689
2690 // get tick in which the user clicked
2691 int pos_ticks = x * TimePos::ticksPerBar() / m_ppb +
2692 m_currentPosition;
2693
2694
2695 // get note-vector of current MIDI clip
2696 const NoteVector & notes = m_midiClip->notes();
2697
2698 // will be our iterator in the following loop
2699 auto it = notes.begin();
2700
2701 // loop through whole note-vector...
2702 while( it != notes.end() )
2703 {
2704 Note *note = *it;
2705 TimePos len = note->length();
2706 if( len < 0 )
2707 {
2708 len = 4;
2709 }
2710 // and check whether the user clicked on an
2711 // existing note or an edit-line
2712 if( pos_ticks >= note->pos() &&
2713 len > 0 &&
2714 (
2715 ( ! edit_note &&
2716 pos_ticks <= note->pos() + len &&
2717 note->key() == key_num )
2718 ||
2719 ( edit_note &&
2720 pos_ticks <= note->pos() +
2721 NOTE_EDIT_LINE_WIDTH *
2722 TimePos::ticksPerBar() /
2723 m_ppb )
2724 )
2725 )
2726 {
2727 // delete this note
2728 it = m_midiClip->removeNote(it);
2729 Engine::getSong()->setModified();
2730 }
2731 else
2732 {
2733 ++it;
2734 }
2735 }
2736 }
2737 else if (me->buttons() == Qt::NoButton && m_editMode != EditMode::Draw && m_editMode != EditMode::Knife && m_editMode != EditMode::Strum)
2738 {
2739 // Is needed to restore cursor when it previously was set to
2740 // Qt::SizeVerCursor (between keyAreaBottom and noteEditTop)
2741 setCursor( Qt::ArrowCursor );
2742 }
2743 }
2744 else
2745 {
2746 setCursor( Qt::ArrowCursor );
2747 }
2748
2749 m_lastMouseX = me->x();
2750 m_lastMouseY = me->y();
2751
2752 update();
2753}
