2755
2756
2757
2758void PianoRoll::updateKnifePos(QMouseEvent* me, bool initial)
2759{
2760 // Calculate the TimePos from the mouse
2761 int mouseViewportPosX = me->x() - m_whiteKeyWidth;
2762 int mouseViewportPosY = keyAreaBottom() - 1 - me->y();
2763 int mouseTickPos = mouseViewportPosX * TimePos::ticksPerBar() / m_ppb + m_currentPosition;
2764 int mouseKey = std::round(1.f * mouseViewportPosY / m_keyLineHeight) + m_startKey - 1;
2765
2766 // If ctrl is not pressed, quantize the position
2767 if (!(me->modifiers() & Qt::ControlModifier))
2768 {
2769 mouseTickPos = std::round(1.f * mouseTickPos / quantization()) * quantization();
2770 }
2771
2772 if (initial)
2773 {
2774 m_knifeStartTickPos = mouseTickPos;
2775 m_knifeStartKey = mouseKey;
2776 }
2777 m_knifeEndTickPos = mouseTickPos;
2778 m_knifeEndKey = mouseKey;
2779}
2780
2781/*
2782 * Setup chords
2783 *
2784 * A chord is an island of notes--as the loop goes over the notes, if the notes overlap,
2785 * they are part of the same chord. Else, they are part of a new chord.
2786*/
2787void PianoRoll::setupSelectedChords()
2788{
2789 if (!hasValidMidiClip()) { return; }
2790 m_selectedChords.clear();
2791 m_midiClip->rearrangeAllNotes();
2792
2793 const NoteVector& selectedNotes = getSelectedNotes();
2794 if (selectedNotes.empty()) { return; }
2795
2796 int maxTime = -1;
2797 NoteVector currentChord;
2798 for (Note* note: selectedNotes)
2799 {
2800 // If the note is not in the current chord range (and this isn't the first chord), start a new chord.
2801 if (note->pos() >= maxTime && maxTime != -1)
2802 {
2803 // Sort the notes by key before adding the chord to the vector
2804 std::sort(currentChord.begin(), currentChord.end(), [](Note* a, Note* b){ return a->key() < b->key(); });
2805 m_selectedChords.push_back(currentChord);
2806 currentChord.clear();
2807 maxTime = note->endPos();
2808 }
2809 maxTime = std::max(maxTime, static_cast<int>(note->endPos()));
2810 currentChord.push_back(note);
2811 }
2812 // Add final chord
2813 std::sort(currentChord.begin(), currentChord.end(), [](Note* a, Note* b){ return a->key() < b->key(); });
2814 m_selectedChords.push_back(currentChord);
2815}
2816
2817/*
2818 * Perform the Strum
2819 *
2820 * Notes above the clicked note (relative to each chord) will be strummed down, notes below will be strummed up.
2821 * Holding shift raises the amount of movement to a power, causing the strum to be curved/warped.
2822*/
2823void PianoRoll::updateStrumPos(QMouseEvent* me, bool initial, bool warp)
2824{
2825 if (!hasValidMidiClip()) { return; }
2826 // Calculate the TimePos from the mouse
2827 int mouseViewportPos = me->x() - m_whiteKeyWidth;
2828 int mouseTickPos = mouseViewportPos * TimePos::ticksPerBar() / m_ppb + m_currentPosition;
2829 // Should we add quantization? probably not?
2830 if (initial)
2831 {
2832 m_strumStartTime = mouseTickPos;
2833 m_strumStartVertical = me->y();
2834 }
2835 m_strumCurrentTime = mouseTickPos;
2836 m_strumCurrentVertical = me->y();
2837 int strumTicksHorizontal = m_strumCurrentTime - m_strumStartTime;
2838 float strumPower = fastPow10f(0.01f * (m_strumCurrentVertical - m_strumStartVertical));
2839
2840 if (initial)
2841 {
2842 m_midiClip->addJournalCheckPoint();
2843
2844 Note* clickedNote = noteUnderMouse();
2845 if (clickedNote == nullptr) { return; }
2846
2847 for (NoteVector chord: m_selectedChords)
2848 {
2849 for (Note* note: chord)
2850 {
2851 // Save the current note position
2852 note->setOldPos(note->pos());
2853 // if this is the clicked note, calculate it's ratio up the chord
2854 if (note == clickedNote && chord.size() > 1)
2855 {
2856 m_strumHeightRatio = 1.f * std::distance(chord.begin(), std::find(chord.begin(), chord.end(), clickedNote)) / (chord.size() - 1);
2857 }
2858 }
2859 }
2860 }
2861
2862 for (NoteVector chord: m_selectedChords)
2863 {
2864 // Don't strum a chord with only one note
2865 if (chord.size() <= 1) { continue; }
2866 for (size_t i = 0; i < chord.size(); ++i)
2867 {
2868 float heightRatio = 1.f * i / (chord.size() - 1);
2869 float ratio = 0.0f;
2870
2871 if (heightRatio == m_strumHeightRatio)
2872 {
2873 ratio = 1.f;
2874 }
2875 else if (heightRatio < m_strumHeightRatio)
2876 {
2877 ratio = heightRatio / m_strumHeightRatio;
2878 }
2879 else
2880 {
2881 ratio = (1.f - heightRatio) / (1.f - m_strumHeightRatio);
2882 }
2883
2884 if (warp)
2885 {
2886 ratio = std::pow(ratio, strumPower);
2887 }
2888 chord.at(i)->setPos(std::max(0, static_cast<tick_t>(chord.at(i)->oldPos() + ratio * strumTicksHorizontal)));
2889 }
2890 }
2891 m_midiClip->rearrangeAllNotes();
2892 m_midiClip->updateLength();
2893 m_midiClip->dataChanged();
2894}
2895
2896
2897
2898void PianoRoll::dragNotes(int x, int y, bool alt, bool shift, bool ctrl)
2899{
2900 // dragging one or more notes around
2901
2902 // convert pixels to ticks and keys
2903 int off_x = x - m_moveStartX;
2904 int off_ticks = off_x * TimePos::ticksPerBar() / m_ppb;
2905 int off_key = getKey( y ) - getKey( m_moveStartY );
2906
2907 // handle scroll changes while dragging
2908 off_ticks -= m_mouseDownTick - m_currentPosition;
2909 off_key -= m_mouseDownKey - m_startKey;
2910
2911 // get note-vector of current MIDI clip
2912 const NoteVector & notes = m_midiClip->notes();
2913
2914 if (m_action == Action::MoveNote)
2915 {
2916 // Calculate the offset for either Nudge or Snap modes
2917 int noteOffset = off_ticks;
2918 if (m_gridMode == GridMode::Snap && quantization () > 1)
2919 {
2920 // Get the mouse timeline absolute position
2921 TimePos mousePos(m_currentNote->oldPos().getTicks() + off_ticks);
2922
2923 // We create a mousePos that is relative to the end of the note instead
2924 // of the beginning. That's to see if we will snap the beginning or end
2925 // of the note
2926 TimePos mousePosEnd(mousePos);
2927 mousePosEnd += m_currentNote->oldLength();
2928
2929 // Now we quantize the mouse position to snap it to the grid
2930 TimePos mousePosQ = mousePos.quantize(static_cast<float>(quantization()) / DefaultTicksPerBar);
2931 TimePos mousePosEndQ = mousePosEnd.quantize(static_cast<float>(quantization()) / DefaultTicksPerBar);
2932
2933 bool snapEnd = std::abs(mousePosEndQ - mousePosEnd) < std::abs(mousePosQ - mousePos);
2934
2935 // Set the offset
2936 noteOffset = snapEnd
2937 ? mousePosEndQ.getTicks() - m_currentNote->oldPos().getTicks() - m_currentNote->oldLength().getTicks()
2938 : mousePosQ.getTicks() - m_currentNote->oldPos().getTicks();
2939 }
2940 else if (m_gridMode == GridMode::Nudge)
2941 {
2942 // if they're not holding alt, quantize the offset
2943 if (!alt)
2944 {
2945 noteOffset = floor(off_ticks / quantization()) * quantization();
2946 }
2947 }
2948
2949 // Make sure notes won't go outside boundary conditions
2950 if (m_moveBoundaryLeft + noteOffset < 0)
2951 {
2952 noteOffset = -m_moveBoundaryLeft;
2953 }
2954 if (m_moveBoundaryTop + off_key >= NumKeys)
2955 {
2956 off_key = -m_moveBoundaryTop + NumKeys - 1;
2957 }
2958 if (m_moveBoundaryBottom + off_key < 0)
2959 {
2960 off_key = -m_moveBoundaryBottom;
2961 }
2962
2963 // Apply offset to all selected notes
2964 for (Note *note : getSelectedNotes())
2965 {
2966 // Quick resize is only enabled on Nudge mode, since resizing the note
2967 // while in Snap mode breaks the calculation of the note offset
2968 if (shift && ! m_startedWithShift && m_gridMode == GridMode::Nudge)
2969 {
2970 // quick resize, toggled by holding shift after starting a note move, but not before
2971 int ticks_new = note->oldLength().getTicks() + noteOffset;
2972 if( ticks_new <= 0 )
2973 {
2974 ticks_new = 1;
2975 }
2976 note->setLength( TimePos( ticks_new ) );
2977 m_lenOfNewNotes = note->length();
2978 }
2979 else
2980 {
2981 // moving note
2982
2983 // Final position of the note
2984 TimePos posTicks(note->oldPos().getTicks() + noteOffset);
2985 int key_num = note->oldKey() + off_key;
2986
2987 note->setPos(posTicks);
2988 note->setKey(key_num);
2989 }
2990 }
2991 }
2992 else if (m_action == Action::ResizeNote)
2993 {
2994 // When resizing notes:
2995 // If shift is not pressed, resize the selected notes but do not rearrange them
2996 // If shift is pressed we resize and rearrange only the selected notes
2997 // If shift + ctrl then we also rearrange all posterior notes (sticky)
2998 // If shift is pressed but only one note is selected, apply sticky
2999
3000 // Quantize the resizing if alt is not pressed
3001 if (!alt)
3002 {
3003 off_ticks = floor(off_ticks / quantization()) * quantization();
3004 }
3005
3006 auto selectedNotes = getSelectedNotes();
3007
3008 if (shift)
3009 {
3010 // Algorithm:
3011 // Relative to the starting point of the left-most selected note,
3012 // all selected note start-points and *endpoints* (not length) should be scaled by a calculated factor.
3013 // This factor is such that the endpoint of the note whose handle is being dragged should lie under the cursor.
3014 // first, determine the start-point of the left-most selected note:
3015 int stretchStartTick = -1;
3016 for (const Note *note : selectedNotes)
3017 {
3018 if (stretchStartTick < 0 || note->oldPos().getTicks() < stretchStartTick)
3019 {
3020 stretchStartTick = note->oldPos().getTicks();
3021 }
3022 }
3023 // determine the ending tick of the right-most selected note
3024 const Note *posteriorNote = nullptr;
3025 for (const Note *note : selectedNotes)
3026 {
3027 if (posteriorNote == nullptr ||
3028 note->oldPos().getTicks() + note->oldLength().getTicks() >
3029 posteriorNote->oldPos().getTicks() + posteriorNote->oldLength().getTicks())
3030 {
3031 posteriorNote = note;
3032 }
3033 }
3034 int posteriorEndTick = posteriorNote->pos().getTicks() + posteriorNote->length().getTicks();
3035 // end-point of the note whose handle is being dragged:
3036 int stretchEndTick = m_currentNote->oldPos().getTicks() + m_currentNote->oldLength().getTicks();
3037 // Calculate factor by which to scale the start-point and end-point of all selected notes
3038 float scaleFactor = (float)(stretchEndTick - stretchStartTick + off_ticks) / qMax(1, stretchEndTick - stretchStartTick);
3039 scaleFactor = qMax(0.0f, scaleFactor);
3040
3041 // process all selected notes & determine how much the endpoint of the right-most note was shifted
3042 int posteriorDeltaThisFrame = 0;
3043 for (Note *note : selectedNotes)
3044 {
3045 // scale relative start and end positions by scaleFactor
3046 int newStart = stretchStartTick + scaleFactor *
3047 (note->oldPos().getTicks() - stretchStartTick);
3048 int newEnd = stretchStartTick + scaleFactor *
3049 (note->oldPos().getTicks()+note->oldLength().getTicks() - stretchStartTick);
3050 // if not holding alt, quantize the offsets
3051 if (!alt)
3052 {
3053 // quantize start time
3054 int oldStart = note->oldPos().getTicks();
3055 int startDiff = newStart - oldStart;
3056 startDiff = floor(startDiff / quantization()) * quantization();
3057 newStart = oldStart + startDiff;
3058 // quantize end time
3059 int oldEnd = oldStart + note->oldLength().getTicks();
3060 int endDiff = newEnd - oldEnd;
3061 endDiff = floor(endDiff / quantization()) * quantization();
3062 newEnd = oldEnd + endDiff;
3063 }
3064 int newLength = qMax(1, newEnd-newStart);
3065 if (note == posteriorNote)
3066 {
3067 posteriorDeltaThisFrame = (newStart+newLength) -
3068 (note->pos().getTicks() + note->length().getTicks());
3069 }
3070 note->setLength( TimePos(newLength) );
3071 note->setPos( TimePos(newStart) );
3072
3073 m_lenOfNewNotes = note->length();
3074 }
3075 if (ctrl || selectionCount() == 1)
3076 {
3077 // if holding ctrl or only one note is selected, reposition posterior notes
3078 for (Note *note : notes)
3079 {
3080 if (!note->selected() && note->pos().getTicks() >= posteriorEndTick)
3081 {
3082 int newStart = note->pos().getTicks() + posteriorDeltaThisFrame;
3083 note->setPos( TimePos(newStart) );
3084 }
3085 }
3086 }
3087 }
3088 else
3089 {
3090 // shift is not pressed; stretch length of selected notes but not their position
3091 int minLength = alt ? 1 : m_minResizeLen.getTicks();
3092
3093 if (m_gridMode == GridMode::Snap)
3094 {
3095 // Calculate the end point of the note being dragged
3096 TimePos oldEndPoint = m_currentNote->oldPos() + m_currentNote->oldLength();
3097 // Quantize that position
3098 TimePos quantizedEndPoint = Note::quantized(oldEndPoint, quantization());
3099 // Add that difference to the offset from the resize
3100 off_ticks += quantizedEndPoint - oldEndPoint;
3101 }
3102
3103 for (Note *note : selectedNotes)
3104 {
3105 int newLength = qMax(minLength, note->oldLength() + off_ticks);
3106 note->setLength(TimePos(newLength));
3107
3108 m_lenOfNewNotes = note->length();
3109 }
3110 }
3111 }
3112
3113 m_midiClip->updateLength();
3114 m_midiClip->dataChanged();
3115 Engine::getSong()->setModified();
3116}
3117
3118
3119
3120
3121void PianoRoll::paintEvent(QPaintEvent * pe )
3122{
3123 bool drawNoteNames = ConfigManager::inst()->value( "ui", "printnotelabels").toInt();
3124
3125 QStyleOption opt;
3126 opt.initFrom( this );
3127 QPainter p( this );
3128 style()->drawPrimitive( QStyle::PE_Widget, &opt, &p, this );
3129
3130 QBrush bgColor = p.background();
3131
3132 // fill with bg color
3133 p.fillRect( 0, 0, width(), height(), bgColor );
3134
3135 // set font-size to 80% of key line height
3136 QFont f = p.font();
3137 int keyFontSize = m_keyLineHeight * 0.8;
3138 p.setFont(adjustedToPixelSize(f, keyFontSize));
3139 QFontMetrics fontMetrics(p.font());
3140 // G-1 is one of the widest; plus one pixel margin for the shadow
3141 QRect const boundingRect = fontMetrics.boundingRect(QString("G-1")) + QMargins(0, 0, 1, 0);
3142
3143 auto xCoordOfTick = [this](int tick) {
3144 return m_whiteKeyWidth + (
3145 (tick - m_currentPosition) * m_ppb / TimePos::ticksPerBar()
3146 );
3147 };
3148
3149 // Order of drawing
3150 // - vertical quantization lines
3151 // - piano roll + horizontal key lines
3152 // - alternating bar colors
3153 // - vertical beat lines
3154 // - vertical bar lines
3155 // - marked semitones
3156 // - note editing
3157 // - notes
3158 // - selection frame
3159 // - highlight hovered note
3160 // - note edit area resize bar
3161 // - cursor mode icon
3162
3163 if (hasValidMidiClip())
3164 {
3165 int pianoAreaHeight = keyAreaBottom() - keyAreaTop();
3166 m_pianoKeysVisible = pianoAreaHeight / m_keyLineHeight;
3167 int partialKeyVisible = pianoAreaHeight % m_keyLineHeight;
3168 // check if we're below the minimum key area size
3169 if (m_pianoKeysVisible * m_keyLineHeight < KEY_AREA_MIN_HEIGHT)
3170 {
3171 m_pianoKeysVisible = KEY_AREA_MIN_HEIGHT / m_keyLineHeight;
3172 partialKeyVisible = KEY_AREA_MIN_HEIGHT % m_keyLineHeight;
3173 // if we have a partial key, just show it
3174 if (partialKeyVisible > 0)
3175 {
3176 m_pianoKeysVisible += 1;
3177 partialKeyVisible = 0;
3178 }
3179 // have to modify the notes edit area height instead
3180 m_notesEditHeight = height() - (m_pianoKeysVisible * m_keyLineHeight)
3181 - PR_TOP_MARGIN - PR_BOTTOM_MARGIN;
3182 }
3183 // check if we're trying to show more keys than available
3184 else if (m_pianoKeysVisible >= NumKeys)
3185 {
3186 m_pianoKeysVisible = NumKeys;
3187 // have to modify the notes edit area height instead
3188 m_notesEditHeight = height() - (NumKeys * m_keyLineHeight) -
3189 PR_TOP_MARGIN - PR_BOTTOM_MARGIN;
3190 partialKeyVisible = 0;
3191 }
3192 int topKey = std::clamp(m_startKey + m_pianoKeysVisible - 1, 0, NumKeys - 1);
3193 int topNote = topKey % KeysPerOctave;
3194 // if not resizing the note edit area, we can change m_notesEditHeight
3195 if (m_action != Action::ResizeNoteEditArea && partialKeyVisible != 0)
3196 {
3197 // calculate the height change adding and subtracting the partial key
3198 int noteAreaPlus = (m_notesEditHeight + partialKeyVisible) - m_userSetNotesEditHeight;
3199 int noteAreaMinus = m_userSetNotesEditHeight - (m_notesEditHeight - partialKeyVisible);
3200 // if adding the partial key to height is more distant from the set height
3201 // we want to subtract the partial key
3202 if (noteAreaPlus > noteAreaMinus)
3203 {
3204 m_notesEditHeight -= partialKeyVisible;
3205 // since we're adding a partial key, we add one to the number visible
3206 m_pianoKeysVisible += 1;
3207 }
3208 // otherwise we add height
3209 else { m_notesEditHeight += partialKeyVisible; }
3210 }
3211 int x, q = quantization(), tick;
3212
3213 // draw vertical quantization lines
3214 // If we're over 100% zoom, we allow all quantization level grids
3215 if (m_zoomingModel.value() <= 3)
3216 {
3217 // we're under 100% zoom
3218 // allow quantization grid up to 1/24 for triplets
3219 if (q % 3 != 0 && q < 8) { q = 8; }
3220 // allow quantization grid up to 1/32 for normal notes
3221 else if (q < 6) { q = 6; }
3222 }
3223
3224 p.setPen(m_lineColor);
3225 for (tick = m_currentPosition - m_currentPosition % q,
3226 x = xCoordOfTick(tick);
3227 x <= width();
3228 tick += q, x = xCoordOfTick(tick))
3229 {
3230 p.drawLine(x, keyAreaTop(), x, noteEditBottom());
3231 }
3232
3233 // draw horizontal grid lines and piano notes
3234 p.setClipRect(0, keyAreaTop(), width(), keyAreaBottom() - keyAreaTop());
3235 // the first grid line from the top Y position
3236 int grid_line_y = keyAreaTop() + m_keyLineHeight - 1;
3237
3238 // lambda function for returning the height of a key
3239 auto keyHeight = [&](
3240 const int key
3241 ) -> int
3242 {
3243 switch (prKeyOrder[key % KeysPerOctave])
3244 {
3245 case KeyType::WhiteBig:
3246 return m_whiteKeyBigHeight;
3247 case KeyType::WhiteSmall:
3248 return m_whiteKeySmallHeight;
3249 case KeyType::Black:
3250 return m_blackKeyHeight;
3251 }
3252 return 0; // should never happen
3253 };
3254 // lambda function for returning the distance to the top of a key
3255 auto gridCorrection = [&](
3256 const int key
3257 ) -> int
3258 {
3259 const int keyCode = key % KeysPerOctave;
3260 switch (prKeyOrder[keyCode])
3261 {
3262 case KeyType::WhiteBig:
3263 return m_whiteKeySmallHeight;
3264 case KeyType::WhiteSmall:
3265 // These two keys need to adjust up small height instead of only key line height
3266 if (static_cast<Key>(keyCode) == Key::C || static_cast<Key>(keyCode) == Key::F)
3267 {
3268 return m_whiteKeySmallHeight;
3269 }
3270 case KeyType::Black:
3271 return m_blackKeyHeight;
3272 }
3273 return 0; // should never happen
3274 };
3275 auto keyWidth = [&](
3276 const int key
3277 ) -> int
3278 {
3279 switch (prKeyOrder[key % KeysPerOctave])
3280 {
3281 case KeyType::WhiteSmall:
3282 case KeyType::WhiteBig:
3283 return m_whiteKeyWidth;
3284 case KeyType::Black:
3285 return m_blackKeyWidth;
3286 }
3287 return 0; // should never happen
3288 };
3289 // lambda function to draw a key
3290 auto drawKey = [&](
3291 const int key,
3292 const int yb)
3293 {
3294 const bool mapped = m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->isKeyMapped(key);
3295 const bool pressed = m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->pianoModel()->isKeyPressed(key);
3296 const int keyCode = key % KeysPerOctave;
3297 const int yt = yb - gridCorrection(key);
3298 const int kh = keyHeight(key);
3299 const int kw = keyWidth(key);
3300 // set key colors
3301 p.setPen(QColor(0, 0, 0));
3302 switch (prKeyOrder[keyCode])
3303 {
3304 case KeyType::WhiteSmall:
3305 case KeyType::WhiteBig:
3306 if (mapped)
3307 {
3308 if (pressed) { p.setBrush(m_whiteKeyActiveBackground); }
3309 else { p.setBrush(m_whiteKeyInactiveBackground); }
3310 }
3311 else
3312 {
3313 p.setBrush(m_whiteKeyDisabledBackground);
3314 }
3315 break;
3316 case KeyType::Black:
3317 if (mapped)
3318 {
3319 if (pressed) { p.setBrush(m_blackKeyActiveBackground); }
3320 else { p.setBrush(m_blackKeyInactiveBackground); }
3321 }
3322 else
3323 {
3324 p.setBrush(m_blackKeyDisabledBackground);
3325 }
3326 }
3327 // draw key
3328 p.drawRect(PIANO_X, yt, kw, kh);
3329 // draw note name
3330 if (static_cast<Key>(keyCode) == Key::C || (drawNoteNames && Piano::isWhiteKey(key)))
3331 {
3332 // small font sizes have 1 pixel offset instead of 2
3333 auto zoomOffset = m_zoomYLevels[m_zoomingYModel.value()] > 1.0f ? 2 : 1;
3334 QString noteString = getNoteString(key);
3335 QRect textRect(
3336 m_whiteKeyWidth - boundingRect.width() - 2,
3337 yb - m_keyLineHeight + zoomOffset,
3338 boundingRect.width(),
3339 boundingRect.height()
3340 );
3341 p.setPen(pressed ? m_whiteKeyActiveTextShadow : m_whiteKeyInactiveTextShadow);
3342 p.drawText(textRect.adjusted(0, 1, 1, 0), Qt::AlignRight | Qt::AlignHCenter, noteString);
3343 p.setPen(pressed ? m_whiteKeyActiveTextColor : m_whiteKeyInactiveTextColor);
3344 // if (static_cast<Key>(keyCode) == Key::C) { p.setPen(textColor()); }
3345 // else { p.setPen(textColorLight()); }
3346 p.drawText(textRect, Qt::AlignRight | Qt::AlignHCenter, noteString);
3347 }
3348 };
3349 // lambda for drawing the horizontal grid line
3350 auto drawHorizontalLine = [&](
3351 const int key,
3352 const int y
3353 )
3354 {
3355 if (static_cast<Key>(key % KeysPerOctave) == Key::C) { p.setPen(m_beatLineColor); }
3356 else { p.setPen(m_lineColor); }
3357 p.drawLine(m_whiteKeyWidth, y, width(), y);
3358 };
3359 // correct y offset of the top key
3360 switch (prKeyOrder[topNote])
3361 {
3362 case KeyType::WhiteSmall:
3363 case KeyType::WhiteBig:
3364 break;
3365 case KeyType::Black:
3366 // draw extra white key
3367 drawKey(topKey + 1, grid_line_y - m_keyLineHeight);
3368 }
3369 // loop through visible keys
3370 const int lastKey = qMax(0, topKey - m_pianoKeysVisible);
3371 for (int key = topKey; key > lastKey; --key)
3372 {
3373 bool whiteKey = Piano::isWhiteKey(key);
3374 if (whiteKey)
3375 {
3376 drawKey(key, grid_line_y);
3377 drawHorizontalLine(key, grid_line_y);
3378 grid_line_y += m_keyLineHeight;
3379 }
3380 else
3381 {
3382 // draw next white key
3383 drawKey(key - 1, grid_line_y + m_keyLineHeight);
3384 drawHorizontalLine(key - 1, grid_line_y + m_keyLineHeight);
3385 // draw black key over previous and next white key
3386 drawKey(key, grid_line_y);
3387 drawHorizontalLine(key, grid_line_y);
3388 // drew two grid keys so skip ahead properly
3389 grid_line_y += m_keyLineHeight + m_keyLineHeight;
3390 // capture double key draw
3391 --key;
3392 }
3393 }
3394
3395 // don't draw over keys
3396 p.setClipRect(m_whiteKeyWidth, keyAreaTop(), width(), noteEditBottom() - keyAreaTop());
3397
3398 // draw alternating shading on bars
3399 float timeSignature =
3400 static_cast<float>(Engine::getSong()->getTimeSigModel().getNumerator()) /
3401 static_cast<float>(Engine::getSong()->getTimeSigModel().getDenominator());
3402 float zoomFactor = m_zoomLevels[m_zoomingModel.value()];
3403 //the bars which disappears at the left side by scrolling
3404 int leftBars = m_currentPosition * zoomFactor / TimePos::ticksPerBar();
3405 //iterates the visible bars and draw the shading on uneven bars
3406 for (int x = m_whiteKeyWidth, barCount = leftBars;
3407 x < width() + m_currentPosition * zoomFactor / timeSignature;
3408 x += m_ppb, ++barCount)
3409 {
3410 if ((barCount + leftBars) % 2 != 0)
3411 {
3412 p.fillRect(x - m_currentPosition * zoomFactor / timeSignature,
3413 PR_TOP_MARGIN,
3414 m_ppb,
3415 height() - (PR_BOTTOM_MARGIN + PR_TOP_MARGIN),
3416 m_backgroundShade);
3417 }
3418 }
3419
3420 // draw vertical beat lines
3421 int ticksPerBeat = DefaultTicksPerBar /
3422 Engine::getSong()->getTimeSigModel().getDenominator();
3423 p.setPen(m_beatLineColor);
3424 for(tick = m_currentPosition - m_currentPosition % ticksPerBeat,
3425 x = xCoordOfTick( tick );
3426 x <= width();
3427 tick += ticksPerBeat, x = xCoordOfTick(tick))
3428 {
3429 p.drawLine(x, PR_TOP_MARGIN, x, noteEditBottom());
3430 }
3431
3432 // draw vertical bar lines
3433 p.setPen(m_barLineColor);
3434 for(tick = m_currentPosition - m_currentPosition % TimePos::ticksPerBar(),
3435 x = xCoordOfTick( tick );
3436 x <= width();
3437 tick += TimePos::ticksPerBar(), x = xCoordOfTick(tick))
3438 {
3439 p.drawLine(x, PR_TOP_MARGIN, x, noteEditBottom());
3440 }
3441
3442 // draw marked semitones after the grid
3443 for(x = 0; x < m_markedSemiTones.size(); ++x)
3444 {
3445 const int key_num = m_markedSemiTones.at(x);
3446 const int y = yCoordOfKey(key_num);
3447 if(y >= keyAreaBottom() - 1) { break; }
3448 p.fillRect(m_whiteKeyWidth + 1,
3449 y,
3450 width() - 10,
3451 m_keyLineHeight,
3452 m_markedSemitoneColor);
3453 }
3454 }
3455
3456 // reset MIDI clip
3457 p.setClipRect(0, 0, width(), height());
3458
3459 // erase the area below the piano, because there might be keys that
3460 // should be only half-visible
3461 p.fillRect( QRect( 0, keyAreaBottom(),
3462 m_whiteKeyWidth, noteEditBottom() - keyAreaBottom()), bgColor);
3463
3464 // display note editing info
3465 f.setBold(false);
3466 p.setFont(adjustedToPixelSize(f, SMALL_FONT_SIZE));
3467 p.setPen(m_noteModeColor);
3468 p.drawText( QRect( 0, keyAreaBottom(),
3469 m_whiteKeyWidth, noteEditBottom() - keyAreaBottom()),
3470 Qt::AlignCenter | Qt::TextWordWrap,
3471 m_nemStr.at(static_cast<int>(m_noteEditMode)) + ":" );
3472
3473 // set clipping area, because we are not allowed to paint over
3474 // keyboard...
3475 p.setClipRect(
3476 m_whiteKeyWidth,
3477 PR_TOP_MARGIN,
3478 width() - m_whiteKeyWidth,
3479 height() - PR_TOP_MARGIN - PR_BOTTOM_MARGIN);
3480
3481 // following code draws all notes in visible area
3482 // and the note editing stuff (volume, panning, etc)
3483
3484 // setup selection-vars
3485 int sel_pos_start = m_selectStartTick;
3486 int sel_pos_end = m_selectStartTick+m_selectedTick;
3487 if( sel_pos_start > sel_pos_end )
3488 {
3489 qSwap<int>( sel_pos_start, sel_pos_end );
3490 }
3491
3492 int sel_key_start = m_selectStartKey - m_startKey + 1;
3493 int sel_key_end = sel_key_start + m_selectedKeys;
3494 if( sel_key_start > sel_key_end )
3495 {
3496 qSwap<int>( sel_key_start, sel_key_end );
3497 }
3498
3499 int y_base = keyAreaBottom() - 1;
3500 if( hasValidMidiClip() )
3501 {
3502 p.setClipRect(
3503 m_whiteKeyWidth,
3504 PR_TOP_MARGIN,
3505 width() - m_whiteKeyWidth,
3506 height() - PR_TOP_MARGIN);
3507
3508 const int topKey = qBound(0, m_startKey + m_pianoKeysVisible - 1, NumKeys - 1);
3509 const int bottomKey = topKey - m_pianoKeysVisible;
3510
3511 QPolygonF editHandles;
3512
3513 // Return a note's Y position on the grid
3514 auto noteYPos = [&](const int key)
3515 {
3516 return (topKey - key) * m_keyLineHeight + keyAreaTop() - 1;
3517 };
3518
3519 // -- Begin ghost MIDI clip
3520 if( !m_ghostNotes.empty() )
3521 {
3522 for( const Note *note : m_ghostNotes )
3523 {
3524 int len_ticks = note->length();
3525
3526 if( len_ticks == 0 )
3527 {
3528 continue;
3529 }
3530 else if( len_ticks < 0 )
3531 {
3532 len_ticks = 4;
3533 }
3534
3535 int pos_ticks = note->pos();
3536
3537 int note_width = len_ticks * m_ppb / TimePos::ticksPerBar();
3538 const int x = ( pos_ticks - m_currentPosition ) *
3539 m_ppb / TimePos::ticksPerBar();
3540 // skip this note if not in visible area at all
3541 if (!(x + note_width >= 0 && x <= width() - m_whiteKeyWidth))
3542 {
3543 continue;
3544 }
3545
3546 // is the note in visible area?
3547 if (note->key() > bottomKey && note->key() <= topKey)
3548 {
3549
3550 // we've done and checked all, let's draw the note
3551 drawNoteRect(
3552 p, x + m_whiteKeyWidth, noteYPos(note->key()), note_width,
3553 note, m_ghostNoteColor, m_ghostNoteTextColor, m_selectedNoteColor,
3554 m_ghostNoteOpacity, m_ghostNoteBorders, drawNoteNames);
3555 }
3556
3557 }
3558 }
3559 // -- End ghost MIDI clip
3560
3561 for( const Note *note : m_midiClip->notes() )
3562 {
3563 int len_ticks = note->length();
3564
3565 if( len_ticks == 0 )
3566 {
3567 continue;
3568 }
3569 else if( len_ticks < 0 )
3570 {
3571 len_ticks = 4;
3572 }
3573
3574 int pos_ticks = note->pos();
3575
3576 int note_width = len_ticks * m_ppb / TimePos::ticksPerBar();
3577 const int x = ( pos_ticks - m_currentPosition ) *
3578 m_ppb / TimePos::ticksPerBar();
3579 // skip this note if not in visible area at all
3580 if (!(x + note_width >= 0 && x <= width() - m_whiteKeyWidth))
3581 {
3582 continue;
3583 }
3584
3585 // is the note in visible area?
3586 if (note->key() > bottomKey && note->key() <= topKey)
3587 {
3588 // We've done and checked all, let's draw the note with
3589 // the appropriate color
3590 const auto fillColor = note->type() == Note::Type::Regular ? m_noteColor : m_stepNoteColor;
3591
3592 drawNoteRect(
3593 p, x + m_whiteKeyWidth, noteYPos(note->key()), note_width,
3594 note, fillColor, m_noteTextColor, m_selectedNoteColor,
3595 m_noteOpacity, m_noteBorders, drawNoteNames
3596 );
3597 }
3598
3599 // draw note editing stuff
3600 int editHandleTop = 0;
3601 if( m_noteEditMode == NoteEditMode::Volume )
3602 {
3603 QColor color = m_barColor.lighter(30 + (note->getVolume() * 90 / MaxVolume));
3604 if( note->selected() )
3605 {
3606 color = m_selectedNoteColor;
3607 }
3608 p.setPen( QPen( color, NOTE_EDIT_LINE_WIDTH ) );
3609
3610 editHandleTop = noteEditBottom() -
3611 ( (float)( note->getVolume() - MinVolume ) ) /
3612 ( (float)( MaxVolume - MinVolume ) ) *
3613 ( (float)( noteEditBottom() - noteEditTop() ) );
3614
3615 p.drawLine( QLineF ( noteEditLeft() + x + 0.5, editHandleTop + 0.5,
3616 noteEditLeft() + x + 0.5, noteEditBottom() + 0.5 ) );
3617
3618 }
3619 else if( m_noteEditMode == NoteEditMode::Panning )
3620 {
3621 QColor color = m_noteColor;
3622 if( note->selected() )
3623 {
3624 color = m_selectedNoteColor;
3625 }
3626
3627 p.setPen( QPen( color, NOTE_EDIT_LINE_WIDTH ) );
3628
3629 editHandleTop = noteEditBottom() -
3630 ( (float)( note->getPanning() - PanningLeft ) ) /
3631 ( (float)( (PanningRight - PanningLeft ) ) ) *
3632 ( (float)( noteEditBottom() - noteEditTop() ) );
3633
3634 p.drawLine( QLine( noteEditLeft() + x, noteEditTop() +
3635 ( (float)( noteEditBottom() - noteEditTop() ) ) / 2.0f,
3636 noteEditLeft() + x , editHandleTop ) );
3637 }
3638 editHandles << QPoint ( x + noteEditLeft(),
3639 editHandleTop );
3640
3641 if( note->hasDetuningInfo() )
3642 {
3643 drawDetuningInfo(p, note, x + m_whiteKeyWidth, noteYPos(note->key()));
3644 p.setClipRect(
3645 m_whiteKeyWidth,
3646 PR_TOP_MARGIN,
3647 width() - m_whiteKeyWidth,
3648 height() - PR_TOP_MARGIN);
3649 }
3650 }
3651
3652 // draw clip bounds
3653 p.fillRect(
3654 xCoordOfTick(m_midiClip->length() - m_midiClip->startTimeOffset()),
3655 PR_TOP_MARGIN,
3656 width() - 10,
3657 noteEditBottom(),
3658 m_outOfBoundsShade
3659 );
3660 p.fillRect(
3661 0,
3662 PR_TOP_MARGIN,
3663 xCoordOfTick(-m_midiClip->startTimeOffset()),
3664 noteEditBottom(),
3665 m_outOfBoundsShade
3666 );
3667
3668 // -- Knife tool (draw cut line)
3669 if (m_action == Action::Knife && m_knifeDown)
3670 {
3671 int x1 = xCoordOfTick(m_knifeStartTickPos);
3672 int y1 = y_base - (m_knifeStartKey - m_startKey + 1) * m_keyLineHeight;
3673 int x2 = xCoordOfTick(m_knifeEndTickPos);
3674 int y2 = y_base - (m_knifeEndKey - m_startKey + 1) * m_keyLineHeight;
3675
3676 p.setPen(QPen(m_knifeCutLineColor, 1));
3677 p.drawLine(x1, y1, x2, y2);
3678 }
3679 // -- End knife tool
3680
3681 //draw current step recording notes
3682 for( const Note *note : m_stepRecorder.getCurStepNotes() )
3683 {
3684 int len_ticks = note->length();
3685
3686 if( len_ticks == 0 )
3687 {
3688 continue;
3689 }
3690
3691
3692 int pos_ticks = note->pos();
3693
3694 int note_width = len_ticks * m_ppb / TimePos::ticksPerBar();
3695 const int x = ( pos_ticks - m_currentPosition ) *
3696 m_ppb / TimePos::ticksPerBar();
3697 // skip this note if not in visible area at all
3698 if (!(x + note_width >= 0 && x <= width() - m_whiteKeyWidth))
3699 {
3700 continue;
3701 }
3702
3703 // is the note in visible area?
3704 if (note->key() > bottomKey && note->key() <= topKey)
3705 {
3706
3707 // we've done and checked all, let's draw the note
3708 drawNoteRect(
3709 p, x + m_whiteKeyWidth, noteYPos(note->key()), note_width,
3710 note, m_currentStepNoteColor, m_noteTextColor, m_selectedNoteColor,
3711 m_noteOpacity, m_noteBorders, drawNoteNames);
3712 }
3713 }
3714
3715 p.setPen(QPen(m_noteColor, NOTE_EDIT_LINE_WIDTH + 2));
3716 p.drawPoints( editHandles );
3717
3718 }
3719 else
3720 {
3721 QFont f = font();
3722 f.setBold(true);
3723 p.setFont(f);
3724 p.setPen( QApplication::palette().color( QPalette::Active,
3725 QPalette::BrightText ) );
3726 p.drawText(m_whiteKeyWidth + 20, PR_TOP_MARGIN + 40,
3727 tr( "Please open a clip by double-clicking "
3728 "on it!" ) );
3729 }
3730
3731 p.setClipRect(
3732 m_whiteKeyWidth,
3733 PR_TOP_MARGIN,
3734 width() - m_whiteKeyWidth,
3735 height() - PR_TOP_MARGIN - m_notesEditHeight - PR_BOTTOM_MARGIN);
3736
3737 // now draw selection-frame
3738 int x = ( ( sel_pos_start - m_currentPosition ) * m_ppb ) /
3739 TimePos::ticksPerBar();
3740 int w = ( ( ( sel_pos_end - m_currentPosition ) * m_ppb ) /
3741 TimePos::ticksPerBar() ) - x;
3742 int y = (int) y_base - sel_key_start * m_keyLineHeight;
3743 int h = (int) y_base - sel_key_end * m_keyLineHeight - y;
3744 p.setPen(m_selectedNoteColor);
3745 p.setBrush( Qt::NoBrush );
3746 p.drawRect(x + m_whiteKeyWidth, y, w, h);
3747
3748 // TODO: Get this out of paint event
3749 int l = ( hasValidMidiClip() )? (int) m_midiClip->length() - m_midiClip->startTimeOffset() : 0;
3750
3751 // reset scroll-range
3752 if( m_leftRightScroll->maximum() != l )
3753 {
3754 m_leftRightScroll->setRange( 0, l );
3755 m_leftRightScroll->setPageStep( l );
3756 }
3757
3758 // set line colors
3759 auto editAreaCol = QColor(m_lineColor);
3760 auto currentKeyCol = QColor(m_beatLineColor);
3761
3762 editAreaCol.setAlpha( 64 );
3763 currentKeyCol.setAlpha( 64 );
3764
3765 // horizontal line for the key under the cursor
3766 if(hasValidMidiClip() && getGUI()->pianoRoll()->hasFocus())
3767 {
3768 int key_num = getKey( mapFromGlobal( QCursor::pos() ).y() );
3769 p.fillRect(
3770 10,
3771 yCoordOfKey(key_num) + 3,
3772 width() - 10,
3773 m_keyLineHeight - 7,
3774 currentKeyCol);
3775 }
3776
3777 // bar to resize note edit area
3778 p.setClipRect( 0, 0, width(), height() );
3779 p.fillRect( QRect( 0, keyAreaBottom(),
3780 width()-PR_RIGHT_MARGIN, NOTE_EDIT_RESIZE_BAR ), editAreaCol );
3781
3782 if (getGUI()->pianoRoll()->hasFocus())
3783 {
3784 const QPixmap * cursor = nullptr;
3785 // draw current edit-mode-icon below the cursor
3786 switch( m_editMode )
3787 {
3788 case EditMode::Draw:
3789 if( m_mouseDownRight )
3790 {
3791 cursor = &m_toolErase;
3792 }
3793 else if( m_action == Action::MoveNote )
3794 {
3795 cursor = &m_toolMove;
3796 }
3797 else
3798 {
3799 cursor = &m_toolDraw;
3800 }
3801 break;
3802 case EditMode::Erase:
3803 cursor = &m_toolErase;
3804 break;
3805 case EditMode::Select:
3806 cursor = &m_toolSelect;
3807 break;
3808 case EditMode::Detuning:
3809 cursor = &m_toolOpen;
3810 break;
3811 case EditMode::Knife:
3812 cursor = &m_toolKnife;
3813 break;
3814 case EditMode::Strum:
3815 cursor = &m_toolStrum;
3816 break;
3817 }
3818 QPoint mousePosition = mapFromGlobal( QCursor::pos() );
3819 if( cursor != nullptr && mousePosition.y() > keyAreaTop() && mousePosition.x() > noteEditLeft())
3820 {
3821 p.drawPixmap( mousePosition + QPoint( 8, 8 ), *cursor );
3822 }
3823 }
3824}

3828
3829void PianoRoll::updateScrollbars()
3830{
3831 m_leftRightScroll->setGeometry(
3832 m_whiteKeyWidth,
3833 height() - SCROLLBAR_SIZE,
3834 width() - m_whiteKeyWidth,
3835 SCROLLBAR_SIZE
3836 );
3837 m_topBottomScroll->setGeometry(
3838 width() - SCROLLBAR_SIZE,
3839 PR_TOP_MARGIN,
3840 SCROLLBAR_SIZE,
3841 height() - PR_TOP_MARGIN - SCROLLBAR_SIZE
3842 );
3843 int pianoAreaHeight = keyAreaBottom() - PR_TOP_MARGIN;
3844 int numKeysVisible = pianoAreaHeight / m_keyLineHeight;
3845 m_totalKeysToScroll = qMax(0, NumKeys - numKeysVisible);
3846 m_topBottomScroll->setRange(0, m_totalKeysToScroll);
3847 if (m_startKey > m_totalKeysToScroll)
3848 {
3849 m_startKey = qMax(0, m_totalKeysToScroll);
3850 }
3851 m_topBottomScroll->setValue(m_totalKeysToScroll - m_startKey);
3852}
3853
3854// responsible for moving/resizing scrollbars after window-resizing
3855void PianoRoll::resizeEvent(QResizeEvent* re)
3856{
3857 updatePositionLineHeight();
3858 updateScrollbars();
3859 m_timeLine->setFixedWidth(width());
3860 update();
3861}

3863
3864void PianoRoll::adjustLeftRightScoll(int value)
3865{
3866 m_leftRightScroll->setValue(m_leftRightScroll->value() -
3867 value * 0.3f / m_zoomLevels[m_zoomingModel.value()]);
3868}

3870
3871
3872void PianoRoll::wheelEvent(QWheelEvent * we )
3873{
3874 we->accept();
3875 // handle wheel events for note edit area - for editing note vol/pan with mousewheel
3876 if(position(we).x() > noteEditLeft() && position(we).x() < noteEditRight()
3877 && position(we).y() > noteEditTop() && position(we).y() < noteEditBottom())
3878 {
3879 if (!hasValidMidiClip()) {return;}
3880 // get values for going through notes
3881 int pixel_range = 8;
3882 int x = position(we).x() - m_whiteKeyWidth;
3883 int ticks_start = ( x - pixel_range / 2 ) *
3884 TimePos::ticksPerBar() / m_ppb + m_currentPosition;
3885 int ticks_end = ( x + pixel_range / 2 ) *
3886 TimePos::ticksPerBar() / m_ppb + m_currentPosition;
3887
3888 // When alt is pressed we only edit the note under the cursor
3889 bool altPressed = we->modifiers() & Qt::AltModifier;
3890 // go through notes to figure out which one we want to change
3891 NoteVector nv;
3892 for ( Note * i : m_midiClip->notes() )
3893 {
3894 if( i->withinRange( ticks_start, ticks_end ) || ( i->selected() && !altPressed ) )
3895 {
3896 nv.push_back(i);
3897 }
3898 }
3899 if( nv.size() > 0 )
3900 {
3901 const int step = (we->angleDelta().y() > 0 ? 1 : -1) * (we->inverted() ? -1 : 1);
3902
3903 if( m_noteEditMode == NoteEditMode::Volume )
3904 {
3905 for ( Note * n : nv )
3906 {
3907 volume_t vol = qBound<int>( MinVolume, n->getVolume() + step, MaxVolume );
3908 n->setVolume( vol );
3909 }
3910 bool allVolumesEqual = std::all_of( nv.begin(), nv.end(),
3911 [nv](const Note *note)
3912 {
3913 return note->getVolume() == nv[0]->getVolume();
3914 });
3915 if ( allVolumesEqual )
3916 {
3917 // show the volume hover-text only if all notes have the
3918 // same volume
3919 showVolTextFloat(nv[0]->getVolume(), position(we), 1000);
3920 }
3921 }
3922 else if( m_noteEditMode == NoteEditMode::Panning )
3923 {
3924 for ( Note * n : nv )
3925 {
3926 panning_t pan = qBound<int>( PanningLeft, n->getPanning() + step, PanningRight );
3927 n->setPanning( pan );
3928 }
3929 bool allPansEqual = std::all_of( nv.begin(), nv.end(),
3930 [nv](const Note *note)
3931 {
3932 return note->getPanning() == nv[0]->getPanning();
3933 });
3934 if ( allPansEqual )
3935 {
3936 // show the pan hover-text only if all notes have the same
3937 // panning
3938 showPanTextFloat( nv[0]->getPanning(), position( we ), 1000 );
3939 }
3940 }
3941 update();
3942 }
3943 }
3944
3945 // not in note edit area, so handle scrolling/zooming and quantization change
3946 else
3947 if( we->modifiers() & Qt::ControlModifier && we->modifiers() & Qt::AltModifier )
3948 {
3949 int q = m_quantizeModel.value();
3950 if((we->angleDelta().x() + we->angleDelta().y()) > 0) // alt + scroll becomes horizontal scroll on KDE
3951 {
3952 q--;
3953 }
3954 else if((we->angleDelta().x() + we->angleDelta().y()) < 0) // alt + scroll becomes horizontal scroll on KDE
3955 {
3956 q++;
3957 }
3958 q = qBound( 0, q, m_quantizeModel.size() - 1 );
3959 m_quantizeModel.setValue( q );
3960 }
3961 else if( we->modifiers() & Qt::ControlModifier && we->modifiers() & Qt::ShiftModifier )
3962 {
3963 int l = m_noteLenModel.value();
3964 if(we->angleDelta().y() > 0)
3965 {
3966 l--;
3967 }
3968 else if(we->angleDelta().y() < 0)
3969 {
3970 l++;
3971 }
3972 l = qBound( 0, l, m_noteLenModel.size() - 1 );
3973 m_noteLenModel.setValue( l );
3974 }
3975 else if( we->modifiers() & Qt::ControlModifier )
3976 {
3977 int z = m_zoomingModel.value();
3978 if(we->angleDelta().y() > 0)
3979 {
3980 z++;
3981 }
3982 else if(we->angleDelta().y() < 0)
3983 {
3984 z--;
3985 }
3986 z = qBound( 0, z, m_zoomingModel.size() - 1 );
3987
3988 int x = (position(we).x() - m_whiteKeyWidth) * TimePos::ticksPerBar();
3989 // ticks based on the mouse x-position where the scroll wheel was used
3990 int ticks = x / m_ppb;
3991 // what would be the ticks in the new zoom level on the very same mouse x
3992 int newTicks = x / (DEFAULT_PR_PPB * m_zoomLevels[z]);
3993 // scroll so the tick "selected" by the mouse x doesn't move on the screen
3994 m_leftRightScroll->setValue(m_leftRightScroll->value() + ticks - newTicks);
3995 // update combobox with zooming-factor
3996 m_zoomingModel.setValue( z );
3997 }
3998
3999 // FIXME: Reconsider if determining orientation is necessary in Qt6.
4000 else if (std::abs(we->angleDelta().x()) > std::abs(we->angleDelta().y())) // scrolling is horizontal
4001 {
4002 adjustLeftRightScoll(we->angleDelta().x());
4003 }
4004 else if(we->modifiers() & Qt::ShiftModifier)
4005 {
4006 adjustLeftRightScoll(we->angleDelta().y());
4007 }
4008 else
4009 {
4010 m_topBottomScroll->setValue(m_topBottomScroll->value() -
4011 we->angleDelta().y() / 30);
4012 }
4013}

4017
4018void PianoRoll::focusOutEvent( QFocusEvent * )
4019{
4020 if( hasValidMidiClip() )
4021 {
4022 for( int i = 0; i < NumKeys; ++i )
4023 {
4024 m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->pianoModel()->midiEventProcessor()->processInEvent( MidiEvent( MidiNoteOff, -1, i, 0 ) );
4025 m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->pianoModel()->setKeyState( i, false );
4026 }
4027 }
4028 if (m_editMode == EditMode::Knife) {
4029 m_editMode = m_knifeMode;
4030 m_action = Action::None;
4031 }
4032 else if (m_editMode == EditMode::Strum)
4033 {
4034 m_editMode = m_strumMode;
4035 m_action = Action::None;
4036 }
4037 else
4038 {
4039 m_editMode = m_ctrlMode;
4040 }
4041 update();
4042}
4043
4044void PianoRoll::focusInEvent( QFocusEvent * ev )
4045{
4046 if ( hasValidMidiClip() )
4047 {
4048 // Assign midi device
4049 m_midiClip->instrumentTrack()->autoAssignMidiDevice(true);
4050 }
4051 QWidget::focusInEvent(ev);
4052}
4053
4054
4055
4056int PianoRoll::getKey(const int y) const
4057{
4058 // Since keys are numbered from the bottom up, we must get the cursor's
4059 // distance from the bottom of the editor, as if the bottom pixel was number 0.
4060 // keyAreaBottom() is the first row BELOW the editor, therefore we subtract 1.
4061 const int distanceFromBottom = keyAreaBottom() - 1 - y;
4062 // As we divide the distance by keyLineHeight, we want to floor() the result,
4063 // which is exactly what integer division does, but only for POSITIVE numbers.
4064 // Therefore we calculate the distance from absolute 0 (to ensure it is positive)
4065 // before dividing.
4066 const int fromAbsoluteBottom = m_startKey * m_keyLineHeight + distanceFromBottom;
4067 return std::clamp(fromAbsoluteBottom / m_keyLineHeight, 0, NumKeys - 1);
4068}
4069
4070
4071
4072int PianoRoll::yCoordOfKey(const int key) const
4073{
4074 // m_startKey is the bottomost visible key and keyAreaBottom() is the first pixel BELOW the editor.
4075 // Count number of keys from bottom, multiply by key height, and add one key height
4076 // since we want to return the TOP pixel of given key
4077 return keyAreaBottom() - ((key - m_startKey + 1) * m_keyLineHeight);
4078}
4079
4080
4081
4082QList<int> PianoRoll::getAllOctavesForKey( int keyToMirror ) const
4083{
4084 QList<int> keys;
4085
4086 int trackKeysPerOctave = trackOctaveSize();
4087 for (int i = keyToMirror % trackKeysPerOctave; i < NumKeys; i += trackKeysPerOctave)
4088 {
4089 keys.append(i);
4090 }
4091
4092 return keys;
4093}
4094
4095Song::PlayMode PianoRoll::desiredPlayModeForAccompany() const
4096{
4097 if (m_midiClip->getTrack()->trackContainer() == Engine::patternStore())
4098 {
4099 return Song::PlayMode::Pattern;
4100 }
4101 return Song::PlayMode::Song;
4102}

4106
4107void PianoRoll::play()
4108{
4109 if( ! hasValidMidiClip() )
4110 {
4111 return;
4112 }
4113
4114 if( Engine::getSong()->playMode() != Song::PlayMode::MidiClip )
4115 {
4116 Engine::getSong()->playMidiClip( m_midiClip );
4117 }
4118 else
4119 {
4120 Engine::getSong()->togglePause();
4121 }
4122}

4126
4127void PianoRoll::record()
4128{
4129 if( Engine::getSong()->isPlaying() )
4130 {
4131 stop();
4132 }
4133 if( m_recording || ! hasValidMidiClip() )
4134 {
4135 return;
4136 }
4137
4138 m_midiClip->addJournalCheckPoint();
4139 m_recording = true;
4140
4141 Engine::getSong()->playMidiClip( m_midiClip, false );
4142}

4145
4146
4147void PianoRoll::recordAccompany()
4148{
4149 if( Engine::getSong()->isPlaying() )
4150 {
4151 stop();
4152 }
4153 if( m_recording || ! hasValidMidiClip() )
4154 {
4155 return;
4156 }
4157
4158 m_midiClip->addJournalCheckPoint();
4159 m_recording = true;
4160
4161 if( m_midiClip->getTrack()->trackContainer() == Engine::getSong() )
4162 {
4163 Engine::getSong()->playSong();
4164 }
4165 else
4166 {
4167 Engine::getSong()->playPattern();
4168 }
4169}

4173
4174bool PianoRoll::toggleStepRecording()
4175{
4176 if(m_stepRecorder.isRecording())
4177 {
4178 m_stepRecorder.stop();
4179 }
4180 else
4181 {
4182 if(hasValidMidiClip())
4183 {
4184 if(Engine::getSong()->isPlaying())
4185 {
4186 m_stepRecorder.start(0, newNoteLen());
4187 }
4188 else
4189 {
4190 m_stepRecorder.start(
4191 Engine::getSong()->getPlayPos(
4192 Song::PlayMode::MidiClip), newNoteLen());
4193 }
4194 }
4195 }
4196
4197 return m_stepRecorder.isRecording();;
4198}

4202
4203void PianoRoll::stop()
4204{
4205 Engine::getSong()->stop();
4206 m_recording = false;
4207 m_scrollBack = m_timeLine->autoScroll() != TimeLineWidget::AutoScrollState::Disabled;
4208}

4210
4211
4212
4213void PianoRoll::startRecordNote(const Note & n )
4214{
4215 if(hasValidMidiClip())
4216 {
4217 if( m_recording &&
4218 Engine::getSong()->isPlaying() &&
4219 (Engine::getSong()->playMode() == desiredPlayModeForAccompany() ||
4220 Engine::getSong()->playMode() == Song::PlayMode::MidiClip ))
4221 {
4222 TimePos sub;
4223 if( Engine::getSong()->playMode() == Song::PlayMode::Song )
4224 {
4225 sub = m_midiClip->startPosition();
4226 }
4227 Note n1( 1, Engine::getSong()->getPlayPos(
4228 Engine::getSong()->playMode() ) - sub,
4229 n.key(), n.getVolume(), n.getPanning() );
4230 if( n1.pos() >= 0 )
4231 {
4232 m_recordingNotes << n1;
4233 }
4234 }
4235 else if (m_stepRecorder.isRecording())
4236 {
4237 m_stepRecorder.notePressed(n);
4238 }
4239 }
4240}
4241
4242
4243
4244
4245void PianoRoll::finishRecordNote(const Note & n )
4246{
4247 if(hasValidMidiClip())
4248 {
4249 if( m_recording &&
4250 Engine::getSong()->isPlaying() &&
4251 ( Engine::getSong()->playMode() ==
4252 desiredPlayModeForAccompany() ||
4253 Engine::getSong()->playMode() ==
4254 Song::PlayMode::MidiClip ) )
4255 {
4256 for( QList<Note>::Iterator it = m_recordingNotes.begin();
4257 it != m_recordingNotes.end(); ++it )
4258 {
4259 if( it->key() == n.key() )
4260 {
4261 Note n1(n.length(), it->pos(),
4262 it->key(), it->getVolume(),
4263 it->getPanning(), n.detuning());
4264
4265 if (m_doAutoQuantization)
4266 {
4267 n1.quantizeLength(quantization());
4268 n1.quantizePos(quantization());
4269 }
4270 m_midiClip->addNote(n1, false);
4271 update();
4272 m_recordingNotes.erase( it );
4273 break;
4274 }
4275 }
4276 }
4277 else if (m_stepRecorder.isRecording())
4278 {
4279 m_stepRecorder.noteReleased(n);
4280 }
4281 }
4282}

4315
4316
4317void PianoRoll::selectAll()
4318{
4319 if( ! hasValidMidiClip() )
4320 {
4321 return;
4322 }
4323
4324 // if first_time = true, we HAVE to set the vars for select
4325 bool first_time = true;
4326
4327 for( const Note *note : m_midiClip->notes() )
4328 {
4329 int len_ticks = static_cast<int>( note->length() ) > 0 ?
4330 static_cast<int>( note->length() ) : 1;
4331
4332 const int key = note->key();
4333
4334 int pos_ticks = note->pos();
4335 if( key <= m_selectStartKey || first_time )
4336 {
4337 // if we move start-key down, we have to add
4338 // the difference between old and new start-key
4339 // to m_selectedKeys, otherwise the selection
4340 // is just moved down...
4341 m_selectedKeys += m_selectStartKey
4342 - ( key - 1 );
4343 m_selectStartKey = key - 1;
4344 }
4345 if( key >= m_selectedKeys + m_selectStartKey ||
4346 first_time )
4347 {
4348 m_selectedKeys = key - m_selectStartKey;
4349 }
4350 if( pos_ticks < m_selectStartTick ||
4351 first_time )
4352 {
4353 m_selectStartTick = pos_ticks;
4354 }
4355 if( pos_ticks + len_ticks >
4356 m_selectStartTick + m_selectedTick ||
4357 first_time )
4358 {
4359 m_selectedTick = pos_ticks +
4360 len_ticks -
4361 m_selectStartTick;
4362 }
4363 first_time = false;
4364 }
4365}

4380 {
4381 selectedNotes.push_back( note );
4382 }
4383 }
4384 }
4385 return selectedNotes;
4386}

4400void PianoRoll::enterValue( NoteVector* nv )
4401{
4402
4403 if( m_noteEditMode == NoteEditMode::Volume )
4404 {
4405 bool ok;
4406 int new_val;
4407 new_val = QInputDialog::getInt( this, "Piano roll: note velocity",
4408 tr( "Please enter a new value between %1 and %2:" ).
4409 arg( MinVolume ).arg( MaxVolume ),
4410 (*nv)[0]->getVolume(),
4411 MinVolume, MaxVolume, 1, &ok );
4412
4413 if( ok )
4414 {
4415 for ( Note * n : *nv )
4416 {
4417 n->setVolume( new_val );
4418 }
4419 m_lastNoteVolume = new_val;
4420 }
4421 }
4422 else if( m_noteEditMode == NoteEditMode::Panning )
4423 {
4424 bool ok;
4425 int new_val;
4426 new_val = QInputDialog::getInt( this, "Piano roll: note panning",
4427 tr( "Please enter a new value between %1 and %2:" ).
4428 arg( PanningLeft ).arg( PanningRight ),
4429 (*nv)[0]->getPanning(),
4430 PanningLeft, PanningRight, 1, &ok );
4431
4432 if( ok )
4433 {
4434 for ( Note * n : *nv )
4435 {
4436 n->setPanning( new_val );
4437 }
4438 m_lastNotePanning = new_val;
4439 }
4440
4441 }

4445void PianoRoll::updateYScroll()
4446{
4447 m_topBottomScroll->setGeometry(width() - SCROLLBAR_SIZE, PR_TOP_MARGIN,
4448 SCROLLBAR_SIZE,
4449 height() - PR_TOP_MARGIN -
4450 SCROLLBAR_SIZE);
4451
4452 const int visible_space = keyAreaBottom() - keyAreaTop();
4453 m_totalKeysToScroll = qMax(0, NumKeys - 1 - visible_space / m_keyLineHeight);
4454
4455 m_topBottomScroll->setRange(0, m_totalKeysToScroll);
4456
4457 if(m_startKey > m_totalKeysToScroll)
4458 {
4459 m_startKey = m_totalKeysToScroll;
4460 }
4461 m_topBottomScroll->setValue(m_totalKeysToScroll - m_startKey);
4462}

4464
4465void PianoRoll::copyToClipboard( const NoteVector & notes ) const
4466{
4467 // For copyString() and MimeType enum class
4468 using namespace Clipboard;
4469
4470 DataFile dataFile( DataFile::Type::ClipboardData );
4471 QDomElement note_list = dataFile.createElement( "note-list" );
4472 dataFile.content().appendChild( note_list );
4473
4474 TimePos start_pos( notes.front()->pos().getBar(), 0 );
4475 for( const Note *note : notes )
4476 {
4477 Note clip_note( *note );
4478 clip_note.setPos( clip_note.pos( start_pos ) );
4479 clip_note.saveState( dataFile, note_list );
4480 }
4481
4482 copyString( dataFile.toString(), MimeType::Default );
4483}

4500
4501void PianoRoll::cutSelectedNotes()
4502{
4503 if( ! hasValidMidiClip() )
4504 {
4505 return;
4506 }
4507
4508 NoteVector selected_notes = getSelectedNotes();
4509
4510 if( ! selected_notes.empty() )
4511 {
4512 m_midiClip->addJournalCheckPoint();
4513
4514 copyToClipboard( selected_notes );
4515
4516 Engine::getSong()->setModified();
4517
4518 for( Note *note : selected_notes )
4519 {
4520 // note (the memory of it) is also deleted by
4521 // MidiClip::removeNote(...) so we don't have to do that
4522 m_midiClip->removeNote( note );
4523 }
4524 }
4525
4526 update();
4527 getGUI()->songEditor()->update();
4528}
4529
4530
4531
4532
4533void PianoRoll::pasteNotes()
4534{
4535 // For getString() and MimeType enum class
4536 using namespace Clipboard;
4537
4538 if( ! hasValidMidiClip() )
4539 {
4540 return;
4541 }
4542
4543 QString value = getString( MimeType::Default );
4544
4545 if( ! value.isEmpty() )
4546 {
4547 DataFile dataFile( value.toUtf8() );
4548
4549 QDomNodeList list = dataFile.elementsByTagName( Note::classNodeName() );
4550
4551 // remove selection and select the newly pasted notes
4552 clearSelectedNotes();
4553
4554 if( ! list.isEmpty() )
4555 {
4556 m_midiClip->addJournalCheckPoint();
4557 }
4558
4559 for( int i = 0; ! list.item( i ).isNull(); ++i )
4560 {
4561 // create the note
4562 Note cur_note;
4563 cur_note.restoreState( list.item( i ).toElement() );
4564 cur_note.setPos( cur_note.pos() + Note::quantized( m_timeLine->pos(), quantization() ) );
4565
4566 // select it
4567 cur_note.setSelected( true );
4568
4569 // add to MIDI clip
4570 m_midiClip->addNote( cur_note, false );
4571 }
4572
4573 // we only have to do the following lines if we pasted at
4574 // least one note...
4575 Engine::getSong()->setModified();
4576 update();
4577 getGUI()->songEditor()->update();
4578 }
4579}
4580
4581
4582
4583
4584//Return false if no notes are deleted
4585bool PianoRoll::deleteSelectedNotes()
4586{
4587 if (!hasValidMidiClip()) { return false; }
4588
4589 auto selectedNotes = getSelectedNotes();
4590 if (selectedNotes.empty()) { return false; }
4591
4592 m_midiClip->addJournalCheckPoint();
4593
4594 for (Note* note: selectedNotes) { m_midiClip->removeNote( note ); }
4595
4596 Engine::getSong()->setModified();
4597 update();
4598 getGUI()->songEditor()->update();
4599 return true;
4600}

4604
4605void PianoRoll::autoScroll( const TimePos & t )
4606{
4607 const int w = width() - m_whiteKeyWidth;
4608 if (m_timeLine->autoScroll() == TimeLineWidget::AutoScrollState::Stepped)
4609 {
4610 if (t > m_currentPosition + w * TimePos::ticksPerBar() / m_ppb)
4611 {
4612 m_leftRightScroll->setValue(t.getBar() * TimePos::ticksPerBar());
4613 }
4614 else if (t < m_currentPosition)
4615 {
4616 TimePos t2 = std::max(t - w * TimePos::ticksPerBar() *
4617 TimePos::ticksPerBar() / m_ppb, static_cast<tick_t>(0));
4618 m_leftRightScroll->setValue(t2.getBar() * TimePos::ticksPerBar());
4619 }
4620 }
4621 else if (m_timeLine->autoScroll() == TimeLineWidget::AutoScrollState::Continuous)
4622 {
4623 m_leftRightScroll->setValue(std::max(t.getTicks() - w * TimePos::ticksPerBar() / m_ppb / 2, 0));
4624 }
4625 m_scrollBack = false;
4626}
4627
4628
4629
4630void PianoRoll::updatePosition(const TimePos & t)
4631{
4632 if ((Engine::getSong()->isPlaying()
4633 && Engine::getSong()->playMode() == Song::PlayMode::MidiClip
4634 && m_timeLine->autoScroll() != TimeLineWidget::AutoScrollState::Disabled
4635 ) || m_scrollBack)
4636 {
4637 autoScroll(t);
4638 }
4639 // ticks relative to m_currentPosition
4640 // < 0 = outside viewport left
4641 // > width = outside viewport right
4642 const int pos = (static_cast<int>(m_timeLine->pos()) - m_currentPosition) * m_ppb / TimePos::ticksPerBar();
4643 // if pos is within visible range, show it
4644 if (pos >= 0 && pos <= width() - m_whiteKeyWidth)
4645 {
4646 m_positionLine->show();
4647 // adjust pos for piano keys width and self line width (align to rightmost of line)
4648 m_positionLine->move(pos + m_whiteKeyWidth - (m_positionLine->width() - 1), keyAreaTop());
4649 }
4650 else
4651 {
4652 m_positionLine->hide();
4653 }
4654}
4655

4659 m_positionLine->setFixedHeight(keyAreaBottom() - keyAreaTop());
4660}

4664
4665void PianoRoll::updatePositionAccompany( const TimePos & t )
4666{
4667 Song * s = Engine::getSong();
4668
4669 if( m_recording && hasValidMidiClip() &&
4670 s->playMode() != Song::PlayMode::MidiClip )
4671 {
4672 TimePos pos = t;
4673 if (s->playMode() != Song::PlayMode::Pattern)
4674 {
4675 pos -= m_midiClip->startPosition();
4676 }
4677 if( (int) pos > 0 )
4678 {
4679 s->getPlayPos( Song::PlayMode::MidiClip ).setTicks( pos );
4680 autoScroll( pos );
4681 }
4682 }
4683}

4736
4737int PianoRoll::quantization() const
4738{
4739 if( m_quantizeModel.value() == 0 )
4740 {
4741 if( m_noteLenModel.value() > 0 )
4742 {
4743 return newNoteLen();
4744 }
4745 else
4746 {
4747 return DefaultTicksPerBar / 16;
4748 }
4749 }
4750
4751 return DefaultTicksPerBar / Quantizations[m_quantizeModel.value() - 1];
4752}
4753
4754
4755void PianoRoll::quantizeNotes(QuantizeAction mode)
4756{
4757 if( ! hasValidMidiClip() )
4758 {
4759 return;
4760 }
4761
4762 m_midiClip->addJournalCheckPoint();
4763
4764 NoteVector notes = getSelectedNotes();
4765
4766 if( notes.empty() )
4767 {
4768 for( Note* n : m_midiClip->notes() )
4769 {
4770 notes.push_back( n );
4771 }
4772 }
4773
4774 for( Note* n : notes )
4775 {
4776 if( n->length() == TimePos( 0 ) )
4777 {
4778 continue;
4779 }
4780
4781 Note copy(*n);
4782 m_midiClip->removeNote( n );
4783 if (mode == QuantizeAction::Both || mode == QuantizeAction::Pos)
4784 {
4785 copy.quantizePos(quantization());
4786 }
4787 if (mode == QuantizeAction::Both || mode == QuantizeAction::Length)
4788 {
4789 copy.quantizeLength(quantization());
4790 }
4791 m_midiClip->addNote(copy, false);
4792 }
4793
4794 update();
4795 getGUI()->songEditor()->update();
4796 Engine::getSong()->setModified();
4797}

4802void PianoRoll::updateSemiToneMarkerMenu()
4803{
4804 const InstrumentFunctionNoteStacking::ChordTable& chord_table =
4805 InstrumentFunctionNoteStacking::ChordTable::getInstance();
4806 const InstrumentFunctionNoteStacking::Chord& scale =
4807 chord_table.getScaleByName( m_scaleModel.currentText() );
4808 const InstrumentFunctionNoteStacking::Chord& chord =
4809 chord_table.getChordByName( m_chordModel.currentText() );
4810
4811 emit semiToneMarkerMenuScaleSetEnabled( ! scale.isEmpty() );
4812 emit semiToneMarkerMenuChordSetEnabled( ! chord.isEmpty() );
4813}

4818TimePos PianoRoll::newNoteLen() const
4819{
4820 if( m_noteLenModel.value() == 0 )
4821 {
4822 return m_lenOfNewNotes;
4823 }
4824

4827}

4838
4839
4840Note * PianoRoll::noteUnderMouse()
4841{
4842 QPoint pos = mapFromGlobal( QCursor::pos() );
4843
4844 if (pos.x() <= m_whiteKeyWidth
4845 || pos.x() > width() - SCROLLBAR_SIZE
4846 || pos.y() < PR_TOP_MARGIN
4847 || pos.y() > keyAreaBottom() )
4848 {
4849 return nullptr;
4850 }
4851
4852 int key_num = getKey( pos.y() );
4853 int pos_ticks = (pos.x() - m_whiteKeyWidth) *
4854 TimePos::ticksPerBar() / m_ppb + m_currentPosition;
4855
4856 // loop through whole note-vector...
4857 for( Note* const& note : m_midiClip->notes() )
4858 {
4859 // and check whether the cursor is over an
4860 // existing note
4861 if( pos_ticks >= note->pos()
4862 && pos_ticks <= note->endPos()
4863 && note->key() == key_num
4864 && note->length() > 0 )
4865 {
4866 return note;
4867 }
4868 }
4869
4870 return nullptr;
4871}

5307
5308void PianoRollWindow::saveSettings( QDomDocument & doc, QDomElement & de )
5309{
5310 if( !m_editor->ghostNotes().empty() )
5311 {
5312 QDomElement ghostNotesRoot = doc.createElement( "ghostnotes" );
5313 for( Note *note : m_editor->ghostNotes() )
5314 {
5315 QDomElement ghostNoteNode = doc.createElement( "ghostnote" );
5316 ghostNoteNode.setAttribute( "len", note->length() );
5317 ghostNoteNode.setAttribute( "key", note->key() );
5318 ghostNoteNode.setAttribute( "pos", note->pos() );
5319
5320 ghostNotesRoot.appendChild(ghostNoteNode);
5321 }
5322 de.appendChild( ghostNotesRoot );
5323 }
5324
5325 if (m_editor->m_markedSemiTones.length() > 0)
5326 {
5327 QDomElement markedSemiTonesRoot = doc.createElement("markedSemiTones");
5328 for (int markedSemiTone : m_editor->m_markedSemiTones)
5329 {
5330 QDomElement semiToneNode = doc.createElement("semiTone");
5331 semiToneNode.setAttribute("key", markedSemiTone);
5332 markedSemiTonesRoot.appendChild(semiToneNode);
5333 }
5334 de.appendChild(markedSemiTonesRoot);
5335 }
5336
5337 de.setAttribute("stopbehaviour", static_cast<int>(
5338 Engine::getSong()->getTimeline(Song::PlayMode::MidiClip).stopBehaviour()));
5339
5340 MainWindow::saveWidgetState( this, de );
5341}
5342
5343
5344
5345
5346void PianoRollWindow::loadSettings( const QDomElement & de )
5347{
5348 m_editor->loadGhostNotes( de.firstChildElement("ghostnotes") );
5349 m_editor->loadMarkedSemiTones(de.firstChildElement("markedSemiTones"));
5350
5351 MainWindow::restoreWidgetState( this, de );
5352
5353 Engine::getSong()->getTimeline(Song::PlayMode::MidiClip).setStopBehaviour(
5354 static_cast<Timeline::StopBehaviour>(de.attribute("stopbehaviour").toInt()));
5355
5356 // update margins here because we're later in the startup process
5357 // We can't earlier because everything is still starting with the
5358 // WHITE_KEY_WIDTH default
5359 QMargins qm = m_editor->m_stepRecorderWidget.margins();
5360 qm.setLeft(m_editor->m_whiteKeyWidth);
5361 m_editor->m_stepRecorderWidget.setMargins(qm);
5362 m_editor->m_timeLine->setXOffset(m_editor->m_whiteKeyWidth);
5363}

5412
5413void PianoRollWindow::exportMidiClip()
5414{
5415 FileDialog exportDialog(this, tr("Export clip"), "",
5416 tr("XML clip file (*.xpt *.xptz)"));
5417
5418 auto layout = dynamic_cast<QGridLayout*>(exportDialog.layout());
5419 QCheckBox* onlySelectedNotesCheckBox = nullptr;
5420 if (layout)
5421 {
5422 onlySelectedNotesCheckBox = new QCheckBox(tr("Export only selected notes"), &exportDialog);
5423 layout->addWidget(onlySelectedNotesCheckBox);
5424 }
5425
5426 exportDialog.setAcceptMode(FileDialog::AcceptSave);
5427
5428 if (exportDialog.exec() == QDialog::Accepted &&
5429 !exportDialog.selectedFiles().isEmpty() &&
5430 !exportDialog.selectedFiles().first().isEmpty())
5431 {
5432 QString suffix =
5433 ConfigManager::inst()->value("app", "nommpz").toInt() == 0
5434 ? "xptz"
5435 : "xpt";
5436 exportDialog.setDefaultSuffix(suffix);
5437
5438 const QString fullPath = exportDialog.selectedFiles()[0];
5439
5440 // Check if only the selected notes should be exported
5441 auto* midiClip = m_editor->m_midiClip;
5442
5443 const bool onlySelectedNotes = onlySelectedNotesCheckBox && onlySelectedNotesCheckBox->isChecked();
5444
5445 DataFile dataFile(DataFile::Type::MidiClip);
5446 midiClip->exportToXML(dataFile, dataFile.content(), onlySelectedNotes);
5447
5448 if (dataFile.writeFile(fullPath))
5449 {
5450 TextFloat::displayMessage(tr("Export clip success"),
5451 tr("Clip saved to %1").arg(fullPath),
5452 embed::getIconPixmap("project_export"), 4000);
5453 }
5454 }
5455}
5456
5457
5458
5459
5460void PianoRollWindow::importMidiClip()
5461{
5462 // Overwrite confirmation.
5463 if (!m_editor->m_midiClip->empty() &&
5464 QMessageBox::warning(
5465 nullptr,
5466 tr("Import clip."),
5467 tr("You are about to import a clip, this will "
5468 "overwrite your current clip. Do you want to "
5469 "continue?"),
5470 QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::No, QMessageBox::Yes
5471 ) != QMessageBox::Yes)
5472 {
5473 return;
5474 }
5475
5476 FileDialog importDialog(this, tr("Open clip"), "",
5477 tr("XML clip file (*.xpt *.xptz)"));
5478 importDialog.setFileMode(FileDialog::ExistingFile);
5479
5480 if (importDialog.exec() == QDialog::Accepted &&
5481 !importDialog.selectedFiles().isEmpty())
5482 {
5483 const QString fullPath = importDialog.selectedFiles()[0];
5484 DataFile dataFile(fullPath);
5485
5486 if (dataFile.head().isNull())
5487 {
5488 return;
5489 }
5490
5491 TimePos pos = m_editor->m_midiClip->startPosition(); // Backup position in timeline.
5492
5493 m_editor->m_midiClip->loadSettings(dataFile.content());
5494 m_editor->m_midiClip->movePosition(pos);
5495
5496 TextFloat::displayMessage(tr("Import clip success"),
5497 tr("Imported clip %1!").arg(fullPath),
5498 embed::getIconPixmap("project_import"), 4000);
5499 }
5500}
